<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-110">Los tipos de información confidencial requieren una de estas suscripciones:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-119">Número de enrutamiento ABA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-119">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-120">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-120">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-121">nueve dígitos que pueden estar en un patrón con formato o sin formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-121">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-122">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-122">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-123">Con formato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-123">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-124">cuatro dígitos a partir de 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 u 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-124">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-125">un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-125">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-126">cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-126">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-127">un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-127">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-128">un dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-128">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-129">Sin formato: nueve dígitos consecutivos que comienzan por 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 u 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-129">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-130">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-131">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-131">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-132">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-133">Una directiva tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-133">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-134">La función Func_aba_routing encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-134">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-135">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_ABA_Routing.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-135">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-136">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-136">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-137">La función Func_aba_routing encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-137">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-155">Número de identidad nacional (DNI) de Argentina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-155">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-156">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-156">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-157">Ocho dígitos con o sin puntos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-157">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-158">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-158">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-159">Ocho dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-159">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-160">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-160">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-161">un período opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-161">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-162">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-162">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-163">un período opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-163">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-164">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-164">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-165">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-165">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-166">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-166">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-167">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-167">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-168">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-168">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-169">La expresión regular Regex_argentina_national_id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-169">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-170">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_argentina_national_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-170">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-182">Número de cuenta bancaria de Australia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-182">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-183">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-184">de seis a diez dígitos con o sin un número de sucursal de estado bancario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-184">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-185">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-186">El número de cuenta es de 6 a 10 dígitos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-186">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-187">Número de sucursal bancaria de Australia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-187">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-188">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-188">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-189">un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-189">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-190">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-190">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-191">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-192">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-192">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-193">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-194">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-194">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-195">La expresión regular Regex_australia_bank_account_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-195">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-196">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_australia_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-196">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-197">La expresión regular Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-197">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-198">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-198">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-199">La expresión regular Regex_australia_bank_account_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-199">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-200">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_australia_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-200">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-201">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-201">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-202">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-202">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-203">swift bank code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-203">swift bank code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-204">correspondent bank</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-204">correspondent bank</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-223">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-223">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-230">un espacio o un guión opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-230">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-231">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-231">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-232">un espacio o un guión opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-232">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-233">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-233">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-234">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-234">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-235">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-235">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-236">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-236">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-237">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-237">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-238">La función Func_australian_business_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-238">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-239">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keywords_australian_business_number búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-239">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-240">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-240">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-241">La función Func_australian_business_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-241">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-262">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-262">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-263">un espacio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-263">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-264">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-264">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-268">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-268">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-269">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-269">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-270">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-270">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-271">La función Func_Australian_Company_Number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-271">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-272">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keyword_Australian_Company_Number búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-272">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-273">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-273">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-274">La función Func_Australian_Company_Number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-274">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-284">Número de licencia de conductor de Australia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-284">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-285">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-286">nueve letras y dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-286">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-287">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-288">nueve letras y dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-288">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-289">dos dígitos o letras (no distinguen mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-289">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-290">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-290">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-291">cinco dígitos o letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-291">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-292">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-292">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-293">de una a dos letras opcionales (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-293">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-294">de cuatro a nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-294">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-295">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-295">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-296">nueve dígitos o letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-296">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-297">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-297">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-298">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-298">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-299">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-299">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-300">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-300">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-301">La expresión regular Regex_australia_drivers_license_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-301">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-302">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-302">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-303">No se encuentra ninguna palabra clave de Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-303">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-403">Número de cuenta médica de Australia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-403">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-404">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-405">Entre 10 y 11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-405">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-406">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-407">Entre 10 y 11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-407">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-408">El primer dígito está en el intervalo de 2 a 6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-408">1st digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-409">El no.9 dígito es un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-409">9th digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-410">El 10 dígito es el dígito de emisión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-410">10th digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-411">El undécimo dígito (opcional) es el número individual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-411">11th digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-412">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-412">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-413">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-413">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-414">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-414">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-415">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-415">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-416">La función Func_australian_medical_account_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-416">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-417">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-417">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-418">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-418">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_australia_medical_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-420">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-420">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-421">bank account details</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-421">bank account details</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-422">medicare payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-422">medicare payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-423">mortgage account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-423">mortgage account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-424">bank payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-424">bank payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-425">information branch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-425">information branch</span></span>

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-430">Número de pasaporte de Australia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-430">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-431">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-432">Una letra seguida de siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-432">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-433">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-434">Una letra (sin distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas) seguida de siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-434">A letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-435">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-435">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-436">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-436">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-437">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-437">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-438">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-438">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-439">La expresión regular Regex_australia_passport_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-439">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-440">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keyword_passport o Keyword_australia_passport_number búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-440">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-441">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-441">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-442">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-442">Keyword_passport</span></span>

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-474">Número de archivo fiscal de Australia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-474">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-475">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-476">de ocho a nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-476">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-477">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-478">de ocho a nueve dígitos que normalmente se presentan con espacios de la siguiente manera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-478">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-479">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-479">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-480">un espacio opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-480">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-481">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-481">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-482">un espacio opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-482">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-483">de dos a tres dígitos donde el último dígito es un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-483">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-484">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-485">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-485">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-486">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-487">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-487">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-488">La función Func_australian_tax_file_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-488">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-489">No se encuentra ninguna palabra clave de Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number ni Keyword_number_exclusions.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-489">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-490">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-490">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-502">Número de licencia de conducción de Austria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-502">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-503">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-503">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-504">ocho dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-504">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-505">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-505">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-506">ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-506">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-507">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-507">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-508">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-508">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-509">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-509">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-510">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-510">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-511">La expresión regular  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-511">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-512">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-512">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-639">Tarjeta de identidad de Austria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-639">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-640">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-640">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-641">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-641">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-642">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-642">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-643">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-643">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-644">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-644">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-645">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-645">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-646">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-646">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-647">Una combinación de 24 caracteres de letras, dígitos y caracteres especiales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-647">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-648">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-648">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-649">24 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-649">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-650">22 letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas), dígitos, barras diagonales inversas, barras diagonales o signos más</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-650">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-651">dos letras (no distinguen mayúsculas de minúsculas), dígitos, barras diagonales inversas, barras diagonales, signos más o signos iguales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-651">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-652">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-652">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-653">No aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-653">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-654">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-654">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-655">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-655">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-656">La expresión regular  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-656">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-657">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-657">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-658">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-658">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-659">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-659">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-660">número de identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-660">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-661">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-661">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-662">personalauslichs republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-662">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-663">Número de pasaporte de Austria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-663">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-664">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-665">Una letra seguida de un espacio opcional y siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-665">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-666">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-667">Una combinación de una letra, siete dígitos y un espacio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-667">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-668">una letra (no distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-668">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-669">un espacio (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-669">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-670">siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-670">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-671">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-672">no aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-672">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-673">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-674">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-674">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-675">La expresión regular  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-675">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-676">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-676">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-677">La expresión regular encuentra la fecha con el `Regex_eu_passport_date1` formato DD.MM.YYYY o se encuentra una palabra clave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-677">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-678">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-678">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-679">La expresión regular  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-679">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-680">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-680">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-701">Número de la seguridad social de Austria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-701">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-702">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-702">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-703">10 dígitos en el formato especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-703">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-704">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-704">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-705">10 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-705">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-706">tres dígitos que corresponden a un número de serie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-706">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-707">un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-707">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-708">seis dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-708">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-709">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-709">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-710">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-710">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-711">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-711">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-712">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-712">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-713">La función  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-713">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-714">se encuentra una  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` palabra clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-714">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-715">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-715">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-716">La función  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-716">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-742">Número de identificación fiscal de Austria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-742">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-743">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-743">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-744">nueve dígitos con guión opcional y barra diagonal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-744">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-745">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-745">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-746">nueve dígitos con guión opcional y barra diagonal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-746">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-747">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-747">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-748">un guión (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-748">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-749">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-749">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-750">una barra diagonal (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-750">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-751">cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-751">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-752">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-752">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-753">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-753">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-754">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-754">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-755">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-755">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-756">La función  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-756">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-757">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-757">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-758">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-758">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-759">La función  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-759">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-782">Austria value added tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-782">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-783">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-783">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-784">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-784">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-785">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-785">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-786">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-786">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-787">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-787">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-788">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-788">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-789">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-789">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-790">Patrón alfanumérico de 11 caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-790">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-791">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-791">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-792">Patrón alfanumérico de 11 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-792">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-793">A o a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-793">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-794">T o t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-794">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-795">Espacio opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-795">Optional space</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-805">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-806">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-806">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-808">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-808">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-809">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-809">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-810">La función Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-810">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-828">Clave de autenticación de Azure DocumentDB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-828">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-829">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-830">La cadena "DocumentDb" seguida de los caracteres y cadenas descritos en el siguiente patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-830">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-831">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-831">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-832">La cadena "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-832">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-833">Cualquier combinación de entre 3 y 200 letras minúsculas o mayúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiales o espacios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-833">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-834">Un símbolo mayor que (>), un signo igual (=), una comilla (") o un apóstrofe (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-834">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-835">Cualquier combinación de 86 letras minúsculas o mayúsculas, dígitos, barra diagonal (/) o signo más (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-835">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-836">Dos signos iguales (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-836">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-837">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-837">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-838">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-838">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-839">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-839">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-840">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-840">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-841">La expresión regular CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-841">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-842">La expresión regular CEP_CommonExampleKeywords no encuentra contenido que coincida con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-842">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-857">Cadena de conexión de base de datos IAAS de Azure y cadena de conexión SQL azure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-857">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-858">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-858">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-859">La cadena "Server", "server" o "data source" seguida de los caracteres y cadenas descritos en el patrón siguiente, incluida la cadena "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-859">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-860">com" o "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-860">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-861">net" o "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-861">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-862">net" y la cadena "Password" o "password" o "pwd".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-862">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-863">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-863">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-864">la cadena "Server", "server" o "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-864">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-865">de cero a dos caracteres de espacios en blanco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-865">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-866">un signo igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-866">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-867">de cero a dos caracteres de espacios en blanco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-867">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-868">cualquier combinación de entre 1 y 200 letras minúsculas o mayúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiales o espacios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-868">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-869">La cadena "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-869">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-870">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-870">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-871">net" o "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-871">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-872">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-872">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-873">cualquier combinación de entre 1 y 300 letras minúsculas o mayúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiales o espacios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-873">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-874">la cadena "Password", "password" o "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-874">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-875">de cero a dos caracteres de espacios en blanco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-875">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-876">un signo igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-876">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-877">de cero a dos caracteres de espacios en blanco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-877">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-878">uno o más caracteres que no son un punto y coma (;), comillas (") o apóstrofe (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-878">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-879">punto y coma (;), comillas (") o apóstrofe (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-879">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-880">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-880">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-881">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-881">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-882">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-882">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-883">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-883">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-884">La expresión regular CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-884">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-885">La expresión regular CEP_CommonExampleKeywords no encuentra contenido que coincida con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-885">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-900">Cadena de conexión de Azure IoT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-900">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-901">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-901">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-902">La cadena "HostName" seguida de los caracteres y cadenas descritos en el siguiente patrón, incluidas las cadenas "azure-devices.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-902">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-903">net" y "SharedAccessKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-903">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-904">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-904">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-905">la cadena "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-905">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-906">de cero a dos caracteres de espacios en blanco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-906">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-907">un signo igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-907">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-908">de cero a dos caracteres de espacios en blanco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-908">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-909">cualquier combinación de entre 1 y 200 letras minúsculas o mayúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiales o espacios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-909">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-910">la cadena "azure-devices.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-910">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-911">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-911">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-912">cualquier combinación de entre 1 y 200 letras minúsculas o mayúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiales o espacios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-912">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-913">la cadena "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-913">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-914">de cero a dos caracteres de espacios en blanco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-914">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-915">un signo igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-915">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-916">de cero a dos caracteres de espacios en blanco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-916">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-917">cualquier combinación de 43 letras minúsculas o mayúsculas, dígitos, barra diagonal (/) o signo más (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-917">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-918">un signo igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-918">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-919">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-919">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-920">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-920">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-921">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-921">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-922">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-922">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-923">La expresión regular CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-923">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-924">La expresión regular CEP_CommonExampleKeywords no encuentra contenido que coincida con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-924">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
