- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1008">cualquier combinación de entre 43 y 53 caracteres con letras minúsculas o mayúsculas, dígitos o el signo de porcentaje (%)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1008">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1009">la cadena "%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1009">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1010">cualquier carácter que no sea una letra, dígito o signo de porcentaje en minúsculas o mayúsculas (%)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1010">any character that isn't a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1011">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1011">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1012">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1012">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1013">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1013">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1014">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1014">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1015">La expresión regular CEP_Regex_AzureSAS encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1015">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1016">Cadena de conexión de bus de servicio de Azure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1016">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1017">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1017">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1018">La cadena "EndPoint" seguida de los caracteres y cadenas descritos en el siguiente patrón, incluidas las cadenas "servicebus.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1018">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1019">net" y "SharedAccesKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1019">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1020">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1020">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1021">la cadena "EndPoint"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1021">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1022">de cero a dos caracteres de espacios en blanco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1022">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1023">un signo igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1023">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1024">de cero a dos caracteres de espacios en blanco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1024">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1025">cualquier combinación de entre 1 y 200 letras minúsculas o mayúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiales o espacios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1025">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1026">la cadena "servicebus.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1026">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1027">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1027">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1028">cualquier combinación de entre 1 y 200 letras minúsculas o mayúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiales o espacios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1028">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1029">la cadena "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1029">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1030">de cero a dos caracteres de espacios en blanco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1030">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1031">un signo igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1031">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1032">de cero a dos caracteres de espacios en blanco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1032">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1033">cualquier combinación de 43 caracteres con letras minúsculas o mayúsculas, dígitos, barra diagonal (/) o signo más (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1033">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1034">un signo igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1034">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1035">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1035">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1036">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1036">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1037">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1037">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1038">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1038">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1039">La expresión regular CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1039">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1040">La expresión regular CEP_CommonExampleKeywords no encuentra contenido que coincida con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1040">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1060">de cero a dos caracteres de espacios en blanco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1060">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1061">un signo igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1061">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1065">de cero a dos caracteres de espacios en blanco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1065">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1066">un signo igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1066">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1067">de cero a dos caracteres de espacios en blanco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1067">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1068">cualquier combinación de 86 caracteres con letras minúsculas o mayúsculas, dígitos, barra diagonal (/) o signo más (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1068">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1070">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1070">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1071">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1071">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1072">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1072">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1073">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1073">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1074">La expresión regular CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1074">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1075">La expresión regular CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter no encuentra contenido que coincida con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1075">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1076">La expresión regular CEP_CommonExampleKeywords no encuentra contenido que coincida con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1076">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1094">Clave de cuenta de Azure Storage (genérica)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1094">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1095">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1095">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1096">Cualquier combinación de 86 letras minúsculas o mayúsculas, dígitos, la barra diagonal (/) o signo más (+), precedida o seguida de los caracteres descritos en el patrón siguiente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1096">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1097">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1097">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1098">de cero a uno del símbolo mayor que (>), apóstrofe ('), signo igual (=), comillas (") o signo de número (#)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1098">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1099">cualquier combinación de 86 caracteres con letras minúsculas o mayúsculas, dígitos, barra diagonal (/) o signo más (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1099">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1100">dos signos iguales (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1100">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1101">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1101">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1102">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1102">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1103">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1103">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1104">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1104">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1105">La expresión regular CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1105">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1106">Número de licencia de conductor de Bélgica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1106">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1107">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1108">10 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1108">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1109">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1110">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1110">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1111">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1111">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1112">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1112">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1113">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1113">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1114">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1114">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1115">La expresión regular  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1115">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1116">Se encuentra una `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1116">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1249">Número nacional de Bélgica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1249">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1250">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1250">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1251">11 dígitos más delimitadores opcionales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1251">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1252">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1252">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1253">11 dígitos más delimitadores:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1253">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1254">seis dígitos y dos puntos opcionales en el formato AA. MM.DD fecha de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1254">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1255">Delimitador opcional de punto, guión, espacio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1255">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1256">tres dígitos secuenciales (impares para hombres, incluso para mujer)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1256">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1257">Delimitador opcional de punto, guión, espacio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1257">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1258">dos dígitos de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1258">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1259">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1259">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1260">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1260">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1261">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1261">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1262">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1262">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1263">La función Func_belgium_national_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1263">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1264">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_belgium_national_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1264">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1265">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1265">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1266">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1266">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1267">La función Func_belgium_national_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1267">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1268">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1268">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1327">Número de pasaporte de Bélgica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1327">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1328">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1328">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1329">dos letras seguidas de seis dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1329">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1330">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1330">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1331">dos letras y seguidas de seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1331">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1332">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1332">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1333">no aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1333">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1334">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1334">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1335">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1335">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1336">La expresión regular  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1336">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1337">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1337">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1338">La expresión regular `Regex_eu_passport_date2` encuentra la fecha con el formato DD MM AA o una palabra clave de o se `Keywords_eu_passport_date` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` encuentra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1338">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1339">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1339">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1340">La expresión regular  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1340">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1341">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1341">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1365">Número de impuestos sobre el valor agregado de Bélgica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1365">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1366">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1366">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1367">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1367">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1368">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1368">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1369">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1369">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1370">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1370">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1371">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1371">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1372">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1372">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1373">Patrón alfanumérico de 12 caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1373">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1374">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1374">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1375">Patrón alfanumérico de 12 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1375">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1376">una letra B o b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1376">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1377">una letra E o e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1377">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1378">un dígito 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1378">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1379">un dígito del 1 al 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1379">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1380">un punto opcional, un guión o un espacio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1380">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1381">cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1381">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1382">un punto opcional, un guión o un espacio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1382">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1383">cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1383">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1384">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1384">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1385">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1385">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1386">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1386">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1387">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1387">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1388">La función Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1388">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1389">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1389">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1390">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1390">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1391">La función Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1391">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1403">Número CPF de Brasil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1403">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1404">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1405">11 dígitos incluido un dígito de control y que pueden tener o no formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1405">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1406">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1407">Con formato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1407">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1408">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1408">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1409">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1409">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1410">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1410">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1411">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1411">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1412">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1412">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1413">un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1413">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1414">dos dígitos que son dígitos de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1414">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1415">Sin formato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1415">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1416">11 dígitos, donde los dos últimos dígitos son dígitos de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1416">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1417">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1418">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1418">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1419">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1420">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1420">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1421">La función Func_brazil_cpf encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1421">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1422">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_brazil_cpf.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1422">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1423">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1423">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1424">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1424">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1425">La función Func_brazil_cpf encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1425">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1426">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1426">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1438">Número de entidad jurídica de Brasil (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1438">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1439">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1439">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1440">14 dígitos que incluyen un número de registro, número de sucursal y dígitos de comprobación, además de delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1440">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1441">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1441">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1442">14 dígitos más delimitadores:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1442">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1443">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1443">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1444">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1444">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1445">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1445">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1446">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1446">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1447">tres dígitos (estos primeros ocho dígitos son el número de registro)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1447">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1448">una barra diagonal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1448">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1449">número de rama de cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1449">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1450">un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1450">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1451">dos dígitos que son dígitos de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1451">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1452">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1452">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1453">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1453">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1454">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1454">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1455">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1455">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1456">La función Func_brazil_cnpj encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1456">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1457">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_brazil_cnpj.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1457">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1458">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1458">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1459">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1459">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1460">La función Func_brazil_cnpj encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1460">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1461">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1461">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1483">Tarjeta de identificación nacional de Brasil (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1483">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1484">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1485">Registro Geral (formato antiguo): Nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1485">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1486">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (nuevo formato): 11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1486">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1487">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1487">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1488">Registro de Geral (formato antiguo):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1488">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1489">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1489">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1490">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1490">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1491">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1491">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1492">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1492">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1493">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1493">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1494">un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1494">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1495">un dígito que es un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1495">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1496">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (nuevo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1496">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1497">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1497">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1498">un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1498">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1499">un dígito que es un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1499">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1500">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1500">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1501">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1501">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1502">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1502">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1503">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1503">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1504">La función Func_brazil_rg encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1504">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1505">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_brazil_rg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1505">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1506">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1506">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1517">Número de licencia de conductor de Bulgaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1517">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1518">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1519">nueve dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1519">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1520">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1521">nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1521">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1522">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1523">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1523">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1524">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1525">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1525">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1526">La expresión regular  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1526">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1527">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1527">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1654">Número civil uniforme de Bulgaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1654">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1655">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1655">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1656">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1656">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1657">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1657">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1658">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1658">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1659">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1659">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1660">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1660">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1661">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1662">10 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1662">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1663">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1664">10 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1664">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1665">seis dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1665">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1666">dos dígitos que corresponden al orden de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1666">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1667">un dígito que corresponde al género: un dígito par para el varón y un dígito impar para la mujer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1667">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1668">un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1668">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1669">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1669">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1670">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1670">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1671">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1671">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1672">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1672">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1673">La función  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1673">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1674">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1674">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1675">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1675">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1676">La función  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1676">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1721">Número de pasaporte de Bulgaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1721">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1722">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1722">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1723">nueve dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1723">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1724">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1724">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1725">nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1725">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1726">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1726">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1727">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1727">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1728">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1728">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1729">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1729">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1730">La expresión regular  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1730">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1731">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1731">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1732">La expresión regular encuentra la fecha con el `Regex_eu_passport_date1` formato DD.MM.YYYY o se encuentra una palabra clave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1732">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1733">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1734">La expresión regular  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1734">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1735">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1735">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1755">Número de cuenta bancaria de Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1755">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1756">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1757">7 o 12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1757">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1758">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1759">Un número de cuenta bancaria de Canadá tiene 7 o 12 dígitos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1759">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1760">Un número de tránsito de cuenta bancaria de Canadá es:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1760">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1761">cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1761">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1762">un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1762">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1763">tres dígitos O</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1763">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1764">un cero "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1764">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1765">ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1765">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1766">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1767">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1767">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1768">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1769">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1769">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1770">La expresión regular Regex_canada_bank_account_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1770">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1771">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_canada_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1771">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1772">La expresión regular Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1772">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1773">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1773">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1774">La expresión regular Regex_canada_bank_account_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1774">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1775">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_canada_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1775">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1799">Número de licencia de conductor de Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1799">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1800">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1800">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1801">Varía según la provincia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1801">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1802">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1802">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1803">Varios patrones que cubren Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Terranova y Labrador, Nueva Escocia, Ontario, Isla del Príncipe Eduardo, Quebec y Saskatchewan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1803">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1804">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1805">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1805">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1806">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1807">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1808">La función Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1808">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1809">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1809">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1810">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_canada_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1810">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">

      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />

      </Pattern>

      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1946">Número de servicio de salud de Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1946">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1947">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1947">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1948">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1948">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1949">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1949">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1950">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1950">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1951">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1951">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1952">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1952">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1953">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1953">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1954">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1954">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1955">La expresión regular Regex_canada_health_service_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1955">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1956">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_canada_health_service_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1956">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1968">Número de pasaporte de Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1968">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1969">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1969">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1970">dos letras mayúsculas seguidas de seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1970">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1971">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1971">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1972">dos letras mayúsculas seguidas de seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1972">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1973">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1973">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1974">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1974">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1975">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1975">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1976">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1976">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1977">La expresión regular Regex_canada_passport_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1977">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-1978">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keyword_canada_passport_number o Keyword_passport búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-1978">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2008">Número de identificación personal de salud de Canadá (PHIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2008">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2009">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2009">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2010">nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2010">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2011">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2011">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2012">nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2012">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2013">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2013">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2014">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2014">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2015">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2015">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2016">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2016">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2017">La expresión regular Regex_canada_phin encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2017">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2018">Se encuentran al menos dos palabras clave Keyword_canada_phin o Keyword_canada_provinces búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2018">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
