## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2051">Número de seguro social de Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2051">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2052">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2052">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2053">nueve dígitos con guiones o espacios opcionales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2053">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2054">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2054">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2055">Con formato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2055">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2056">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2056">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2057">un guión o espacio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2057">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2058">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2058">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2059">un guión o espacio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2059">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2060">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2060">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2061">Sin formato: nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2061">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2062">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2063">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2063">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2064">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2065">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2065">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2066">La función Func_canadian_sin encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2066">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2067">Al menos dos de cualquier combinación de lo siguiente:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2067">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2068">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2068">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2069">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_sin_collaborative.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2069">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2070">La función Func_eu_date encuentra una fecha en el formato de fecha correcto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2070">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2071">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2071">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2072">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2072">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2073">La función Func_unformatted_canadian_sin encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2073">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2074">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2074">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2075">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2075">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2100">Número de tarjeta de identidad de Chile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2100">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2101">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2102">siete a ocho dígitos más delimitadores de un dígito de comprobación o una letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2102">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2103">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2104">de siete a ocho dígitos más delimitadores:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2104">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2105">de uno a dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2105">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2106">un período opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2106">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2107">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2107">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2108">un período opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2108">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2109">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2109">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2110">un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2110">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2111">un dígito o letra (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas), que es un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2111">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2112">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2112">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2113">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2113">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2114">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2114">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2115">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2115">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2116">La función Func_chile_id_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2116">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2117">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_chile_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2117">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2118">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2118">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2119">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2119">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2120">La función Func_chile_id_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2120">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2121">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2121">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2158">Número de tarjeta de identidad residente (PRC) de China</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2158">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2159">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2159">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2160">18 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2160">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2161">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2161">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2162">18 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2162">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2163">seis dígitos que son un código de dirección</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2163">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2164">ocho dígitos con el formato YYYYMMDD, que son la fecha de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2164">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2165">tres dígitos que son un código de pedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2165">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2166">un dígito que es un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2166">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2167">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2167">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2168">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2168">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2169">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2169">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2170">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2170">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2171">La función Func_china_resident_id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2171">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2172">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_china_resident_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2172">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2173">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2173">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2174">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2174">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2175">La función Func_china_resident_id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2175">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2176">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2176">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2182">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2182">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2183">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2183">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2184">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2184">居民身份证</span></span>

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2189">Número de tarjeta de crédito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2189">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2190">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2190">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2191">De 14 a 16 dígitos que pueden tener formato o sin formato (dddddddd) y que deben superar la prueba de Luhn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2191">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2192">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2192">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2193">Patrón complejo y sólido que detecta tarjetas de todas las principales marcas de todo el mundo, incluidas Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, tarjetas de obsequios y tarjetas de carta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2193">Complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2194">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2194">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2195">Sí, la suma de comprobación de Luhn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2195">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2196">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2196">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2197">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2197">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2198">La función Func_credit_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2198">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2199">Una de las siguientes opciones es verdadera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2199">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2200">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_cc_verification.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2200">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2201">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_cc_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2201">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2202">La función Func_expiration_date encuentra una fecha en el formato de fecha correcto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2202">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2203">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2203">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2204">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2204">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2205">La función Func_credit_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2205">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2206">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2206">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2466">Número de licencia de conductor de Croacia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2466">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2467">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2467">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2468">ocho dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2468">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2469">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2469">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2470">ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2470">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2471">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2471">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2472">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2472">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2473">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2473">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2474">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2474">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2475">La expresión regular  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2475">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2476">Se encuentra una `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2476">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2600">Número de tarjeta de identidad de Croacia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2600">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2601">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial Número de identificación nacional de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2601">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2602">Está disponible como una entidad independiente de tipo de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2602">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2603">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2603">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2604">nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2604">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2605">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2605">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2606">nueve dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2606">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2607">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2608">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2608">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2609">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2610">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2610">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2611">La función Func_croatia_id_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2611">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2612">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_croatia_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2612">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2643">Número de pasaporte de Croacia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2643">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2644">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2645">nueve dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2645">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2646">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2646">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2647">nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2647">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2648">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2648">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2649">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2649">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2650">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2650">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2651">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2651">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2652">La expresión regular  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2652">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2653">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2653">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2654">La expresión regular encuentra la fecha con el `Regex_eu_passport_date1` formato DD.MM.YYYY o se encuentra una palabra clave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2654">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2655">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2655">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2656">La expresión regular  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2656">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2657">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2657">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2675">Número de identificación personal de Croacia (OIB)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2675">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2676">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2676">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2677">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2677">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2678">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2678">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2679">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2679">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2680">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2680">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2681">dígito final es un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2681">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2682">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2682">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2683">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2683">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2684">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2684">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2685">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2685">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2686">La función Func_croatia_oib_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2686">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2687">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2687">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2688">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2688">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2689">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2689">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2690">La función Func_croatia_oib_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2690">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2691">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2691">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2722">Número de seguridad social de Croacia o identificación equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2722">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2723">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial Número de la Seguridad Social de la UE o Identificador equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2723">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2724">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2724">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2725">11 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2725">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2726">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2726">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2727">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2727">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2728">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2728">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2729">un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2729">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2730">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2731">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2731">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2732">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2733">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2733">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2734">La función  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2734">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2735">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2735">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2736">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2736">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2737">La función  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2737">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2738">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2738">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2739">Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2739">Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2740">número de identificación personal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2740">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2741">número de ciudadano maestro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2741">master citizen number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2742">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2742">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2743">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2743">social security number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2754">Número de licencia de controladores de Chipre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2754">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2755">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2755">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2756">12 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2756">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2757">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2757">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2758">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2758">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2759">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2759">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2760">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2760">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2761">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2761">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2762">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2762">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2763">La expresión regular  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2763">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2764">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2764">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2889">Tarjeta de identidad de Chipre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2889">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2890">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2890">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2891">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2891">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2892">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2892">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2893">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2893">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2894">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2894">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2895">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2895">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2896">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2896">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2897">10 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2897">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2898">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2898">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2899">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2899">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2900">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2900">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2901">no aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2901">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2902">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2902">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2903">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2903">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2904">La expresión regular  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2904">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2905">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2905">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2906">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2906">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2907">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2907">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2914">Número de pasaporte de Chipre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2914">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2915">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2915">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2916">una letra seguida de 6 a 8 dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2916">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2917">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2917">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2918">una letra seguida de seis a ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2918">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2919">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2919">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2920">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2920">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2921">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2921">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2922">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2922">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2923">La expresión regular  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2923">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2924">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2924">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2925">La expresión regular encuentra la fecha con el formato `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` DD/MM/YYYY o se encuentra una palabra clave de `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2925">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2926">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2926">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2927">La expresión regular  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2927">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2928">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2928">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2957">Número de identificación fiscal de Chipre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2957">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2958">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2958">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2959">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2959">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2960">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2960">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2961">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2961">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2962">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2962">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2963">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2963">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2964">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2964">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2965">ocho dígitos y una letra en el patrón especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2965">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2966">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2966">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2967">ocho dígitos y una letra:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2967">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2968">"0" o "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2968">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2969">siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2969">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2970">una letra (no distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2970">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2971">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2971">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2972">no aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2972">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2973">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2973">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2974">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2974">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2975">La función  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2975">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2976">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2976">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2977">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2977">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-2978">La función  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-2978">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3006">Número de licencia de conductor checo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3006">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3007">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3007">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3008">dos letras seguidas de seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3008">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3009">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3009">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3010">ocho letras y dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3010">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3011">letra 'E' (no distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3011">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3012">una carta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3012">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3013">un espacio (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3013">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3014">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3014">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3015">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3015">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3016">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3016">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3017">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3017">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3018">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3018">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3019">La expresión regular  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3019">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3020">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3020">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3146">Número de pasaporte checo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3146">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3147">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3148">ocho dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3148">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3149">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3150">ocho dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3150">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3151">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3152">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3152">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3153">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3154">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3154">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3155">La expresión regular  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3155">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3156">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3156">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3157">La expresión regular encuentra la fecha con el `Regex_eu_passport_date1` formato DD.MM.YYYY o se encuentra una palabra clave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3157">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3158">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3158">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3159">La expresión regular  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3159">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3160">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3160">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3182">Número de identidad personal checo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3182">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3183">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3184">nueve dígitos con barra diagonal opcional (formato antiguo) 10 dígitos con barra diagonal opcional (nuevo formato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3184">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3185">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3186">nueve dígitos (formato antiguo):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3186">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3187">seis dígitos que representan la fecha de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3187">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3188">una barra diagonal opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3188">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3189">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3189">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3190">10 dígitos (nuevo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3190">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3191">seis dígitos que representan la fecha de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3191">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3192">una barra diagonal opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3192">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3193">cuatro dígitos donde el último dígito es un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3193">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3194">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3194">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3195">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3195">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3196">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3196">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3197">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3197">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3198">La función Func_czech_id_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3198">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3199">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_czech_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3199">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3200">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3200">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3201">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3201">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3202">La función Func_czech_id_card_new_format encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3202">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3203">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3203">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3250">Número de la seguridad social checa o identificación equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3250">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3251">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial Número de la Seguridad Social de la UE o Identificador equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3251">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3252">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3252">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3253">10 dígitos y una barra diagonal inversa en el patrón especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3253">10 digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3254">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3254">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3255">10 dígitos y una barra diagonal inversa:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3255">10 digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3256">seis dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (AAMMDD):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3256">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3257">una barra diagonal inversa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3257">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3258">tres dígitos que corresponden a un número de serie que separa a las personas que han nado en la misma fecha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3258">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3259">un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3259">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3260">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3260">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3261">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3261">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3262">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3262">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3263">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3263">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3264">La función  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3264">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3265">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3265">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3266">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3266">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3267">La función  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3267">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3283">Número de licencia de conductor de Dinamarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3283">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3284">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3284">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3285">ocho dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3285">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3286">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3286">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3287">ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3287">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3288">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3288">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3289">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3289">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3290">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3290">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3291">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3291">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3292">La expresión regular  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3292">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3293">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3293">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
