## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3417">Número de pasaporte de Dinamarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3417">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3418">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3418">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3419">nueve dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3419">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3420">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3420">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3421">nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3421">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3422">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3422">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3423">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3423">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3424">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3424">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3425">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3425">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3426">La expresión regular  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3426">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3427">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3427">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3428">La expresión regular `Regex_eu_passport_date2` encuentra la fecha con el formato DD MM AA o se encuentra una palabra clave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3428">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3429">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3430">La expresión regular  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3430">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3431">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3431">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3451">Número de identificación personal de Dinamarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3451">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3452">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3452">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3453">10 dígitos que contienen un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3453">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3454">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3454">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3455">10 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3455">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3456">seis dígitos en el formato DDMMYY, que son la fecha de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3456">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3457">un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3457">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3458">cuatro dígitos donde el dígito final es un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3458">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3459">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3459">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3460">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3460">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3461">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3462">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3462">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3463">La expresión regular Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3463">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3464">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_denmark_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3464">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3465">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3465">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3466">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3466">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3467">La expresión regular Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3467">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3468">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3468">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3540">Número de la seguridad social de Dinamarca o identificación equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3540">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3541">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible el tipo de información confidencial Número de la Seguridad Social de la UE o Identificador equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3541">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3542">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3542">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3543">10 dígitos y un guión en el patrón especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3543">10 digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3544">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3544">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3545">10 dígitos y un guión:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3545">10 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3546">seis dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3546">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3547">un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3547">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3548">cuatro dígitos que corresponden a un número de secuencia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3548">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3549">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3549">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3550">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3550">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3551">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3551">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3552">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3552">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3553">La función  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3553">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3554">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3554">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3555">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3555">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3556">La función  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3556">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">

        </Pattern>

          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3570">Número de la Agencia Antidrogas (DEA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3570">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3571">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3571">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3572">dos letras seguidas de siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3572">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3573">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3573">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3574">El patrón debe incluir todo lo siguiente:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3574">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3575">una letra (no distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas) de este conjunto de letras posibles: abcdefghjklmnprstux, que es un código de registrador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3575">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3576">una letra (no distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas), que es la primera letra del apellido o dígito "9" del registrador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3576">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3577">siete dígitos, el último de los cuales es el dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3577">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3578">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3578">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3579">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3579">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3580">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3580">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3581">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3581">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3582">La función Func_dea_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3582">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3583">Se encuentra una palabra `Keyword_dea_number` clave de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3583">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3584">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3584">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3585">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3585">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3586">La función Func_dea_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3586">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3587">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3587">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3594">Número de licencia de conductor de Estonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3594">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3595">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3595">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3596">dos letras seguidas de seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3596">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3597">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3597">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3598">dos letras y seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3598">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3599">las letras "ET" (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3599">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3600">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3600">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3601">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3601">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3602">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3602">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3603">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3603">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3604">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3604">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3605">La expresión regular  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3605">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3606">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3606">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3732">Código de identificación personal de Estonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3732">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3733">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3733">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3734">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3734">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3735">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3735">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3736">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3736">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3737">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3737">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3738">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3738">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3739">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3739">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3740">11 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3740">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3741">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3741">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3742">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3742">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3743">un dígito que corresponde al sexo y al siglo de nacimiento (número impar varón, número par femenil; 1-2: 19 del s. 19; 3-4: 20 del s. XX; 5-6: s. 21)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3743">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3744">seis dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3744">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3745">tres dígitos que corresponden a un número de serie que separa a las personas que han nado en la misma fecha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3745">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3746">un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3746">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3747">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3747">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3748">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3748">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3749">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3749">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3750">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3750">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3751">La función  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3751">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3752">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3752">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3753">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3753">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3754">La función  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3754">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3787">Número de pasaporte de Estonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3787">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3788">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3788">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3789">una letra seguida de siete dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3789">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3790">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3790">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3791">una letra seguida de siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3791">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3792">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3792">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3793">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3793">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3794">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3794">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3795">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3795">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3796">La expresión regular  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3796">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3797">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3797">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3798">La expresión regular encuentra la fecha con el `Regex_eu_passport_date1` formato DD.MM.YYYY o se encuentra una palabra clave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3798">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3799">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3799">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3800">La expresión regular  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3800">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3801">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3801">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3819">Número de tarjeta de débito de la UE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3819">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3820">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3820">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3821">16 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3821">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3822">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3822">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3823">Patrón complejo y sólido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3823">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3824">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3824">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3825">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3825">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3826">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3826">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3827">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3827">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3828">La función Func_eu_debit_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3828">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3829">Al menos una de las siguientes opciones es verdadera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3829">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3830">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_eu_debit_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3830">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3831">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_card_terms_dict.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3831">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3832">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_card_security_terms_dict.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3832">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3833">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3833">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3834">La función Func_expiration_date encuentra una fecha en el formato de fecha correcto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3834">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-3835">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-3835">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4282">Número de licencia de conductor de Finlandia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4282">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4283">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4283">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4284">10 dígitos que contienen un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4284">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4285">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4285">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4286">10 dígitos que contienen un guión:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4286">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4287">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4287">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4288">un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4288">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4289">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4289">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4290">un dígito o una letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4290">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4291">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4292">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4292">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4293">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4294">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4294">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4295">La expresión regular  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4295">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4296">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4296">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4427">Número de seguro médico europeo de Finlandia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4427">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4428">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4428">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4429">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4429">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4430">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4430">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4431">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4431">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4432">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4432">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4433">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4433">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4434">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4434">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4435">Número de 20 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4435">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4436">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4436">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4437">Número de 20 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4437">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4438">10 dígitos - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4438">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4439">un espacio opcional o un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4439">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4440">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4440">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4441">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4441">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4442">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4442">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4443">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4443">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4444">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4444">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4445">El elemento regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4445">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4446">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4446">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4464">Identificación nacional de Finlandia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4464">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4465">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4465">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4466">seis dígitos más un carácter que indica un siglo más tres dígitos más un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4466">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4467">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4467">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4468">El patrón debe incluir todo lo siguiente:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4468">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4469">seis dígitos en el formato DDMMYY, que son una fecha de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4469">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4470">marcador de century (ya sea '-', '+' o 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4470">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4471">número de identificación personal de tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4471">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4472">un dígito o una letra (no se puede tener en cuenta mayúsculas de minúsculas) que es un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4472">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4473">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4473">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4474">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4474">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4475">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4475">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4476">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4476">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4477">la función Func_finnish_national_id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4477">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4478">se encuentra una palabra clave Keyword_finnish_national_id búsqueda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4478">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4479">la suma de comprobación pasa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4479">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4480">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4480">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4481">la función Func_finnish_national_id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4481">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4482">la suma de comprobación pasa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4482">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4531">Número de pasaporte de Finlandia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4531">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4532">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial Número de pasaporte de la UE y está disponible como una entidad independiente de tipo de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4532">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4533">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4533">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4534">combinación de nueve letras y dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4534">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4535">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4535">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4536">combinación de nueve letras y dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4536">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4537">dos letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4537">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4538">siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4538">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4539">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4540">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4540">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4541">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4542">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4542">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4543">La expresión regular Regex_finland_passport_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4543">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4544">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keywords_eu_passport_number_common o Keyword_finland_passport_number búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4544">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4565">Número de licencia de conductor de Francia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4565">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4566">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial Número de licencia de conductor de la UE y está disponible como una entidad independiente de tipo de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4566">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4567">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4567">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4568">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4568">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4569">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4569">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4570">12 dígitos con validación para descontar patrones similares como los números de teléfono franceses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4570">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4571">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4571">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4572">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4572">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4573">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4573">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4574">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4574">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4575">la función Func_french_drivers_license encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4575">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4576">se encuentra una palabra clave Keyword_french_drivers_license búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4576">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4703">Número de seguro de salud de Francia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4703">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4704">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4704">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4705">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4705">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4706">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4706">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4707">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4707">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4708">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4708">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4709">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4709">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4710">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4710">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4711">Número de 21 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4711">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4712">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4712">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4713">Número de 21 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4713">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4714">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4714">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4715">un espacio opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4715">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4716">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4716">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4717">un espacio opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4717">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4718">un dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4718">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4719">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4719">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4720">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4720">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4721">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4721">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4722">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4722">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4723">el elemento regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4723">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4724">se encuentra una palabra clave Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4724">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4725">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4725">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4726">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4726">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4727">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4727">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4728">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4728">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4729">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4729">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4730">Tarjeta de identificación nacional de Francia (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4730">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4731">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4731">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4732">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4732">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4733">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4733">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4734">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4734">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4735">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4735">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4736">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4736">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4737">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4737">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4738">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4738">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4739">La expresión regular Regex_france_cni encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4739">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4740">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4740">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4741">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4741">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4754">Número de pasaporte de Francia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4754">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4755">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial Número de pasaporte de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4755">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4756">Está disponible como una entidad independiente de tipo de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4756">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4757">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4757">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4758">nueve dígitos y letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4758">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4759">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4760">nueve dígitos y letras:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4760">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4761">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4761">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4762">dos letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4762">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4763">cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4763">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4764">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4764">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4765">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4765">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4766">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4766">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4767">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4767">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4768">La función Func_fr_passport encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4768">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4769">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_passport.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4769">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4790">Número de la seguridad social de Francia (INSEE) o identificación equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4790">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4791">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial Número de la Seguridad Social de la UE y Identificador equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4791">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4792">Está disponible como una entidad independiente de tipo de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4792">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4793">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4793">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4794">15 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4794">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4795">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4795">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4796">Debe coincidir uno de los dos patrones:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4796">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4797">13 dígitos seguidos de un espacio seguido de dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4797">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4798">o</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4798">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4799">15 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4799">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4800">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4801">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4801">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4802">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4803">Una directiva DLP está segura al 95% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4803">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4804">La función Func_french_insee o Func_fr_insee encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4804">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4805">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_fr_insee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4805">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4806">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4806">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4807">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4807">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4808">La función Func_french_insee o Func_fr_insee encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4808">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4809">No se encuentra ninguna palabra clave de Keyword_fr_insee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4809">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4810">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4810">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4836">Número de identificación fiscal de Francia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4836">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4837">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4838">13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4838">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4839">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4840">13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4840">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4841">Un dígito que debe ser 0, 1, 2 o 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4841">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4842">Un dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4842">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4843">Un espacio (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4843">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4844">Dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4844">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4845">Un espacio (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4845">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4846">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4846">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4847">Un espacio (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4847">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4848">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4848">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4849">Un espacio (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4849">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4850">Tres dígitos de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4850">Three check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4851">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4852">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4852">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4853">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4854">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4854">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4855">La función  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4855">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4856">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4856">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4857">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4857">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4858">La función  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4858">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4861">numéro d'identification fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4861">numéro d'identification fiscale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4862">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4862">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4863">identificación fiscal no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4863">tax identification no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4865">tax no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4865">tax no#</span></span>
