## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4878">Número de impuestos del valor agregado de Francia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4878">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4879">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4879">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4880">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4880">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4881">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4881">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4882">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4882">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4883">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4883">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4884">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4884">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4885">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4885">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4886">Patrón alfanumérico de 13 caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4886">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4887">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4887">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4888">Patrón alfanumérico de 13 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4888">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4889">dos letras: FR (no se puede hacer mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4889">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4890">un espacio opcional o un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4890">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4891">dos letras o dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4891">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4892">un espacio opcional, punto, guión o coma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4892">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4893">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4893">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4894">un espacio opcional, punto, guión o coma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4894">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4895">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4895">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4896">un espacio opcional, punto, guión o coma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4896">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4897">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4897">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4898">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4898">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4899">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4899">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4900">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4900">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4901">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4901">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4902">La función Func_france_value_added_tax_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4902">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4903">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4903">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4904">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4904">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4905">La función Func_france_value_added_tax_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4905">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4918">Número de licencia de conductor de Alemania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4918">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4919">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial Número de licencia de conductor de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4919">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4920">Está disponible como una entidad independiente de tipo de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4920">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4921">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4922">combinación de 11 dígitos y letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4922">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4923">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4924">11 dígitos y letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4924">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4925">un dígito o una letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4925">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4926">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4926">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4927">seis dígitos o letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4927">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4928">un dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4928">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4929">un dígito o una letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4929">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4930">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4930">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4931">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4931">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4932">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4932">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4933">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4933">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4934">La función Func_german_drivers_license encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4934">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4935">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_german_drivers_license_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4935">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-4936">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-4936">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5085">Número de tarjeta de identidad de Alemania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5085">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5086">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5087">desde el 1 de noviembre de 2010: nueve letras y dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5087">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5088">del 1 de abril de 1987 al 31 de octubre de 2010: 10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5088">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5089">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5089">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5090">desde el 1 de noviembre de 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5090">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5091">una letra (no distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5091">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5092">ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5092">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5093">desde el 1 de abril de 1987 hasta el 31 de octubre de 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5093">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5094">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5094">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5095">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5095">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5096">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5096">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5097">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5097">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5098">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5098">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5099">La expresión regular Regex_germany_id_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5099">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5100">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_germany_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5100">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5101">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5101">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5116">Número de pasaporte de Alemania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5116">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5117">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial Número de pasaporte de la UE y está disponible como una entidad independiente de tipo de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5117">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5118">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5118">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5119">10 dígitos o letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5119">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5120">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5120">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5121">El patrón debe incluir todo lo siguiente:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5121">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5122">el primer carácter es un dígito o una letra de este conjunto (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5122">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5123">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5123">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5124">cinco dígitos o letras de este conjunto (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5124">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5125">un dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5125">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5126">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5126">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5127">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5127">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5128">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5128">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5129">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5129">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5130">La función Func_german_passport encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5130">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5131">Se encuentra una `Keyword_german_passport` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5131">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5132">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5132">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5133">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5133">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5134">La función Func_german_passport_data encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5134">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5135">Se encuentra una `Keyword_german_passport` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5135">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5136">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5136">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5159">Número de identificación fiscal de Alemania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5159">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5160">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5160">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5161">11 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5161">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5162">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5162">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5163">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5163">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5164">Dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5164">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5165">Un espacio opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5165">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5166">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5166">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5167">Un espacio opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5167">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5168">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5168">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5169">Un espacio opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5169">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5170">Dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5170">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5171">un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5171">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5172">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5173">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5173">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5174">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5175">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5175">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5176">La función  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5176">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5177">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5177">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5178">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5178">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5179">La función  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5179">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5205">Número de impuestos del valor agregado de Alemania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5205">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5206">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5206">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5207">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5207">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5208">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5208">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5209">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5209">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5210">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5210">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5211">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5211">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5212">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5212">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5213">Patrón alfanumérico de 11 caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5213">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5214">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5214">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5215">Patrón alfanumérico de 11 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5215">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5216">una letra D o d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5216">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5217">una letra E o e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5217">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5218">un espacio opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5218">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5219">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5219">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5220">un espacio o coma opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5220">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5221">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5221">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5222">un espacio o coma opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5222">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5223">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5223">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5224">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5224">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5225">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5225">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5226">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5226">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5227">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5227">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5228">La función Func_germany_value_added_tax_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5228">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5229">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5229">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5230">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5230">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5231">La función Func_germany_value_added_tax_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5231">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5241">Número de licencia de conductor de Grecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5241">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5242">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial Número de licencia de conductor de la UE y está disponible como una entidad independiente de tipo de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5242">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5243">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5243">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5244">nueve dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5244">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5245">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5245">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5246">nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5246">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5247">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5248">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5248">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5249">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5250">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5250">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5251">La expresión regular  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5251">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5252">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5252">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5378">Tarjeta de identificación nacional de Grecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5378">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5379">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5379">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5380">Combinación de 7 u 8 letras y números más un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5380">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5381">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5381">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5382">Siete letras y números (formato antiguo):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5382">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5383">Una letra (cualquier letra del alfabeto griego) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5383">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5384">Un guión </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5384">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5385">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5385">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5386">Ocho letras y números (nuevo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5386">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5387">Dos letras cuyos caracteres en mayúscula se encuentren tanto en el alfabeto griego como latino (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5387">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5388">Un guión </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5388">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5389">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5389">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5390">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5390">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5391">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5391">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5392">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5392">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5393">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5393">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5394">La expresión regular Regex_greece_id_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5394">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5395">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_greece_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5395">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5396">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5396">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5397">La expresión regular Regex_greece_id_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5397">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5398">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5398">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5399">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5399">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5400">id. griego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5400">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5401">id. nacional griego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5401">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5402">tarjeta de identificación personal de griego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5402">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5403">id. de la policía griego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5403">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5404">documento de identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5404">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5405">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5405">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5406">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5406">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5407">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5407">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5408">Número de pasaporte de Grecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5408">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5409">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5409">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5410">Dos letras seguidas de siete dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5410">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5411">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5411">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5412">Dos letras seguidas de siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5412">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5413">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5413">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5414">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5414">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5415">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5415">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5416">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5416">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5417">La expresión regular  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5417">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5418">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5418">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5419">La expresión regular encuentra la fecha con el formato `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` DD MMM AA (ejemplo: 28 de agosto 19) o se encuentra una palabra clave de `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5419">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5420">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5420">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5421">La expresión regular  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5421">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5422">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5422">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5439">Número de la Seguridad Social de Grecia (AMKA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5439">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5440">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5440">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5441">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5441">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5442">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5442">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5443">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5443">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5444">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5444">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5445">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5445">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5446">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5446">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5447">Once dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5447">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5448">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5448">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5449">6 dígitos como fecha de nacimiento AAMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5449">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5450">4 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5450">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5451">un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5451">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5452">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5452">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5453">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5453">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5454">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5454">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5455">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5455">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5456">La función  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5456">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5457">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5457">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5458">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5458">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5459">La función  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5459">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5471">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5471">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5472">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5472">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5473">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5473">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5474">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5474">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5475">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5475">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5476">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5476">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5477">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5477">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5478">Nueve dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5478">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5479">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5479">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5480">Nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5480">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5481">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5481">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5482">No aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5482">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5483">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5483">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5484">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5484">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5485">La expresión regular  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5485">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5486">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5486">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5515">Número de tarjeta de identidad de Hong Kong (HKID)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5515">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5516">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5516">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5517">Combinación de 8 o 9 letras y números, más paréntesis opcionales alrededor del carácter final</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5517">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5518">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5518">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5519">Combinación de 8 o 9 letras:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5519">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5520">De 1 a 2 letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5520">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5521">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5521">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5522">El último carácter (cualquier dígito o la letra A), que es el dígito de control y, opcionalmente, se incluye entre paréntesis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5522">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5523">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5523">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5524">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5524">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5525">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5525">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5526">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5526">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5527">La función Func_hong_kong_id_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5527">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5528">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_hong_kong_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5528">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5529">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5529">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5530">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5530">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5531">La función Func_hong_kong_id_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5531">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5532">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5532">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5572">Número de licencia de conductor de Hungría</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5572">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5573">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5573">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5574">Dos letras seguidas de seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5574">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5575">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5575">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5576">Dos letras y seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5576">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5577">Dos letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5577">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5578">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5578">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5579">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5579">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5580">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5580">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5581">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5581">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5582">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5582">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5583">La expresión regular  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5583">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5584">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5584">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5709">Número de identificación personal de Hungría</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5709">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5710">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5710">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5711">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5711">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5712">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5712">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5713">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5713">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5714">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5714">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5715">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5715">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5716">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5716">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5717">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5717">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5718">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5718">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5719">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5719">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5720">Un dígito que corresponde al sexo (1-varón, 2-mujer, otros números también son posibles para los ciudadanos que nazcan antes de 1900 o los ciudadanos con doble nacionalidad)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5720">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5721">Seis dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5721">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5722">Tres dígitos que corresponden a un número de serie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5722">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5723">Un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5723">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5724">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5724">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5725">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5725">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5726">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5726">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5727">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5727">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5728">La función  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5728">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5729">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5729">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5730">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5730">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5731">La función  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5731">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5732">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5732">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5733">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5733">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5734">id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5734">id number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5736">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5736">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5737">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5737">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5738">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5738">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5739">sz.ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5739">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5740">személyaganosító igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5740">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5741">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5741">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5742">Número de pasaporte de Hungría</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5742">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5743">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5743">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5744">Dos letras seguidas de seis o siete dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5744">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5745">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5745">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5746">Dos letras seguidas de seis o siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5746">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5747">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5747">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5748">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5748">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5749">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5749">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5750">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5750">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5751">La expresión regular  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5751">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5752">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5752">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5753">La expresión regular encuentra la fecha con el formato `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AA (ejemplo: 01 MÁR/MAR 12) o se encuentra una palabra clave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5753">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5754">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5754">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5755">La expresión regular  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5755">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5756">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5756">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5757">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5757">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5773">Número de la seguridad social de Hungría (TAJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5773">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5774">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5774">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5775">Nueve dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5775">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5776">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5776">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5777">Nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5777">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5778">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5778">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5779">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5779">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5780">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5780">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5781">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5781">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5782">La función  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5782">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5783">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5783">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5784">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5784">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5785">La función  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5785">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
