## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5805">Número de identificación fiscal de Hungría</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5805">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5806">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5806">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5807">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5807">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5808">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5808">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5809">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5809">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5810">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5810">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5811">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5811">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5812">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5812">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5813">10 dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5813">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5814">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5814">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5815">10 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5815">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5816">Un dígito que debe ser "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5816">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5817">Ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5817">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5818">Un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5818">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5819">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5819">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5820">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5820">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5821">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5821">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5822">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5822">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5823">La función  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5823">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5824">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5824">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5825">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5825">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5826">La función  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5826">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5852">Número de impuestos del valor agregado de Hungría</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5852">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5853">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5853">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5854">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5854">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5855">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5855">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5856">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5856">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5857">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5857">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5858">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5858">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5859">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5859">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5860">Patrón alfanumérico de 10 caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5860">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5861">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5861">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5862">Patrón alfanumérico de 10 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5862">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5863">dos letras: HU o hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5863">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5864">espacio opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5864">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5865">ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5865">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5866">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5867">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5867">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5868">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5869">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5869">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5870">La función Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5870">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5871">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5871">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5872">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5872">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5873">La función Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5873">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5874">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5874">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5875">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5875">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5876">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5876">vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5877">número de impuestos del valor agregado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5877">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5878">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5878">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5879">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5879">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5880">hungarianvatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5880">hungarianvatno#</span></span>

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5887">Número de cuenta permanente de India (PAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5887">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5888">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5888">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5889">10 letras o dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5889">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5890">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5890">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5891">10 letras o dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5891">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5892">Tres letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5892">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5893">Una letra en C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (no distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5893">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5894">Una carta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5894">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5895">Cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5895">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5896">Una letra que es un dígito de comprobación alfabético</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5896">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5897">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5897">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5898">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5898">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5899">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5899">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5900">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5900">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5901">La expresión regular Regex_india_permanent_account_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5901">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5902">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_india_permanent_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5902">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5903">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5903">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5904">La expresión regular Regex_india_permanent_account_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5904">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5905">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5905">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5906">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5906">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5907">Número de cuenta permanente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5907">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5908">PAN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5908">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5909">Número de identificación única de India (Aadhaar)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5909">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5910">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5910">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5911">12 dígitos que contienen espacios o guiones opcionales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5911">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5912">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5912">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5913">12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5913">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5914">Un dígito que no es 0 o 1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5914">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5915">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5915">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5916">Un guión o un espacio opcional </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5916">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5917">Cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5917">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5918">Un guión o un espacio opcional </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5918">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5919">El dígito final, que es el dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5919">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5920">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5920">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5921">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5921">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5922">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5922">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5923">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5923">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5924">La función Func_india_aadhaar encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5924">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5925">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_india_aadhar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5925">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5926">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5926">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5927">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5927">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5928">La función Func_india_aadhaar encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5928">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5929">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5929">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5938">Número de tarjeta de identidad (KTP) de Indonesia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5938">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5939">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5939">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5940">16 dígitos que contienen puntos opcionales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5940">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5941">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5941">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5942">16 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5942">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5943">Código de la provincia de dos dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5943">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5944">Un punto (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5944">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5945">Código de ciudad o regencia de dos dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5945">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5946">Código de subdistrito de dos dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5946">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5947">Un punto (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5947">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5948">Seis dígitos en el formato DDMMYY, que son la fecha de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5948">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5949">Un punto (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5949">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5950">Cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5950">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5951">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5951">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5952">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5952">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5953">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5953">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5954">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5954">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5955">La expresión regular Regex_indonesia_id_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5955">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5956">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_indonesia_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5956">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5962">Número de cuenta bancaria internacional (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5962">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5963">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5963">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5964">Código de país (dos letras) más dígitos de control (dos dígitos), más el número IBAN (hasta 30 caracteres)
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5964">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5965">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5965">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5966">El patrón debe incluir todo lo siguiente:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5966">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5967">Código de país de dos letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5967">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5968">Dos dígitos de control (seguidos de un espacio opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5968">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5969">1-7 grupos de cuatro letras o dígitos (pueden estar separados por espacios)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5969">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5970">1-3 letras o dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5970">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-p138">El formato de cada país es ligeramente diferente. El tipo de información confidencial del IBAN cubre estos 60 países:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-p138">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5973">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5973">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5974">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5975">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5975">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5976">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5977">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5977">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5978">La función Func_iban encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5978">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5979">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5979">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5984">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5984">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5987">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5987">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5988">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5988">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5989">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5989">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5990">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5990">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5991">Se encuentra una palabra clave Dictionary_icd_10_updated búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5991">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5992">Se encuentra una palabra clave Dictionary_icd_10_codes búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5992">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5993">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5994">Se encuentra una palabra clave Dictionary_icd_10_ actualización.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5994">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5995">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5995">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5996">Cualquier término del diccionario de palabras clave Dictionary_icd_10_updated, que se basa en la clasificación internacional de enfermedades, la décima revisión, la modificación galo [(ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5996">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5997">Este tipo solo busca el término, no los códigos de seguros.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5997">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5998">Cualquier término del diccionario de palabras clave Dictionary_icd_10_codes, que se basa en la clasificación internacional de enfermedades, la décimo revisión, la modificación galo [(ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5998">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-5999">Este tipo solo busca códigos de seguros, no la descripción.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-5999">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6004">Palabra clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6004">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6005">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6005">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6006">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6006">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6007">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6007">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6008">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6008">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6009">Se encuentra una palabra clave Dictionary_icd_9_updated búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6009">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6010">Se encuentra una palabra clave Dictionary_icd_9_codes búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6010">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6011">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6011">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6012">Se encuentra una palabra clave Dictionary_icd_9_updated búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6012">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">

          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6014">Cualquier término del diccionario de palabras clave Dictionary_icd_9_updated, que se basa en la clasificación internacional de enfermedades, la noveno revisión, la modificación de la infección [(ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6014">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6015">Este tipo solo busca el término, no los códigos de seguros.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6015">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6018">Dirección IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6018">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6019">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6019">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6020">IPv4:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6020">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6021">Patrón complejo que representa las versiones con formato (puntos) y sin formato (sin puntos) de las direcciones IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6021">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6022">IPv6:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6022">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6023">Patrón complejo que representa los números IPv6 con formato (que incluyen dos puntos)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6023">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6024">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6024">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6025">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6025">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6026">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6026">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6027">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6027">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6028">Para IPv6, una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6028">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6029">La expresión regular Regex_ipv6_address encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6029">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6030">No se encuentra ninguna palabra clave de Keyword_ipaddress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6030">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6031">Para IPv4, una directiva DLP está segura al 95% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6031">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6032">La expresión regular Regex_ipv4_address encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6032">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6033">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_ipaddress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6033">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6034">Para IPv6, una directiva DLP está segura al 95% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6034">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6035">La expresión regular Regex_ipv6_address encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6035">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6036">No se encuentra ninguna palabra clave de Keyword_ipaddress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6036">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6037">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6037">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6038">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6038">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6039">IP (esta palabra clave distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6039">IP (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6040">dirección IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6040">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6041">Direcciones IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6041">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6042">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6042">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6043">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6043">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6044">Número de licencia de conductor de Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6044">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6045">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6045">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6046">Seis dígitos seguidos de cuatro letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6046">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6047">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6047">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6048">Seis dígitos y cuatro letras:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6048">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6049">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6049">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6050">Cuatro letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6050">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6051">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6051">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6052">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6052">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6053">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6053">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6054">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6055">La expresión regular  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6055">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6056">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6056">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6057">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6057">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6058">Keywords_eu_driver de s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6058">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6059">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6059">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6060">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6060">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6061">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6061">driverlicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6062">driverlicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6062">driverlicenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6063">driverlicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6063">driverlicence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6179">ceadúnais tiomána</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6179">ceadúnais tiomána</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6180">Número de pasaporte de Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6180">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6181">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6181">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6182">Dos letras o dígitos seguidos de siete dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6182">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6183">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6183">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6184">Dos letras o dígitos seguidos de siete dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6184">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6185">Dos dígitos o letras (no distinguen mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6185">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6186">Siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6186">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6187">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6187">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6188">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6188">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6189">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6189">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6190">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6190">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6191">La expresión regular  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6191">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6192">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6192">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6193">La expresión regular encuentra la fecha con el formato `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (ejemplo: 01 BEA/MAYO 1988) o se encuentra una palabra clave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6193">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6194">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6194">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6195">La expresión regular  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6195">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6196">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6196">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6220">Número de servicio público personal (PPS) de Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6220">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6221">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6221">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6222">Formato antiguo (hasta el 31 de diciembre de 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6222">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6223">siete dígitos seguidos de 1 a 2 letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6223">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6224">Nuevo formato (1 de enero de 2013 y posterior):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6224">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6225">siete dígitos seguidos de dos letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6225">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6226">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6226">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6227">Formato antiguo (hasta el 31 de diciembre de 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6227">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6228">siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6228">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6229">de una a dos letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6229">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6230">Nuevo formato (1 de enero de 2013 y posterior):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6230">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6231">siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6231">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6232">una letra (no distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas) que es un dígito de comprobación alfabético</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6232">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6233">Una letra opcional en el rango A-I o "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6233">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6234">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6234">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6235">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6235">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6236">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6236">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6237">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6237">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6238">La función Func_ireland_pps encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6238">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6239">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6239">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6240">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6240">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6241">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6241">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6242">La función Func_ireland_pps encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6242">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6243">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6243">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6288">Número de cuenta bancaria de Israel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6288">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6289">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6289">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6290">13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6290">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6291">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6291">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6292">Con formato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6292">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6293">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6293">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6294">un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6294">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6295">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6295">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6296">un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6296">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6297">ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6297">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6298">Sin formato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6298">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6299">	13 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6299">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6300">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6300">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6301">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6301">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6302">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6302">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6303">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6303">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6313">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6313">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6315">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6315">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6316">nueve dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6316">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6317">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6317">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6318">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6318">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6319">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6319">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6320">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6320">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6321">La función Func_israeli_national_id_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6321">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6322">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_Israel_National_ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6322">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6323">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6323">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6342">Número de licencia de conductor de Italia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6342">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6343">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial Número de licencia de conductor de la UE y está disponible como una entidad independiente de tipo de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6343">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6344">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6344">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6345">una combinación de 10 letras y dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6345">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6346">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6346">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6347">una combinación de 10 letras y dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6347">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6348">una letra (no distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6348">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6349">la letra "A" o "V" (no distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6349">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6350">siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6350">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6351">una letra (no distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6351">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6352">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6352">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6353">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6353">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6354">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6354">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6355">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6355">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6356">La expresión regular Regex_italy_drivers_license_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6356">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6357">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6357">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6365">Código fiscal de Italia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6365">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6366">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6366">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6367">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6367">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6368">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6368">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6369">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6369">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6370">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6370">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6371">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6371">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6372">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6372">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6373">una combinación de 16 caracteres de letras y dígitos en el patrón especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6373">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6374">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6374">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6375">Una combinación de 16 caracteres de letras y dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6375">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6376">tres letras que corresponden a las tres primeras consonantes en el nombre de familia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6376">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6377">tres letras que corresponden a la primera, tercera y cuarta consonantes del nombre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6377">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6378">dos dígitos que corresponden a los últimos dígitos del año de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6378">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6379">una letra que corresponde a la letra del mes de nacimiento: las letras se usan en orden alfabético, pero solo se usan las letras A a E, H, L, M, P, R a T (por lo tanto, enero es A y octubre es R)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6379">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6380">dos dígitos que corresponden al día del mes de nacimiento: para diferenciar entre sexos, se agregan 40 al día de nacimiento para mujer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6380">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6381">cuatro dígitos que corresponden al código de área específico del territorio en el que la persona ha nazca (los códigos de todo el país se usan para países extranjeros)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6381">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6382">un dígito de paridad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6382">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6383">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6383">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6384">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6384">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6385">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6385">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6386">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6386">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6387">La función  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6387">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6388">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6388">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6389">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6389">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6390">La función  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6390">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6425">Número de pasaporte de Italia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6425">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6426">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6426">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6427">dos letras o dígitos seguidos de siete dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6427">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6428">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6428">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6429">dos letras o dígitos seguidos de siete dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6429">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6430">dos dígitos o letras (no distinguen mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6430">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6431">siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6431">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6432">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6432">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6433">no aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6433">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6434">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6434">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6435">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6435">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6436">La expresión regular  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6436">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6437">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6437">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6438">La expresión regular encuentra la fecha con el formato `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (ejemplo: 01 GEN/JAN 1988) o se encuentra una palabra clave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6438">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6439">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6439">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6440">La expresión regular  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6440">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6441">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6441">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
