## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6465">Número de impuestos del valor agregado de Italia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6465">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6466">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6466">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6467">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6467">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6468">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6468">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6469">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6469">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6470">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6470">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6471">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6471">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6472">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6472">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6473">Patrón alfanumérico de 13 caracteres con delimitadores opcionales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6473">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6474">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6474">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6475">Patrón alfanumérico de 13 caracteres con delimitadores opcionales:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6475">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6476">I o i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6476">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6477">T o t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6477">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6478">espacio opcional, punto, guión o coma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6478">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6479">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6479">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6480">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6481">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6481">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6482">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6483">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6483">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6484">La función Func_italy_value_added_tax_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6484">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6485">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6485">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6486">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6486">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6487">La función Func_italy_value_added_tax_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6487">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6495">Número de cuenta bancaria de Japón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6495">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6496">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6496">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6497">siete u ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6497">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6498">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6498">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6499">número de cuenta bancaria:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6499">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6500">siete u ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6500">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6501">código de sucursal de la cuenta bancaria:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6501">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6502">cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6502">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6503">un espacio o guión (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6503">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6504">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6504">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6505">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6505">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6506">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6506">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6507">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6507">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6508">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6508">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6509">La función Func_jp_bank_account encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6509">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6510">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_jp_bank_account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6510">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6511">Una de las siguientes opciones es verdadera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6511">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6512">La función Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6512">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6513">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6513">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6514">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6514">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6515">La función Func_jp_bank_account encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6515">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6516">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_jp_bank_account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6516">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6564">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6564">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6569">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6569">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6571">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6571">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6572">La función Func_jp_drivers_license_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6572">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6573">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6573">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->

    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6613">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6613">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6617">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6617">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6618">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6618">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6620">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6620">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6621">Número de 13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6621">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6622">un dígito de uno a nueve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6622">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6623">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6623">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6624">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6624">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6625">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6625">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6626">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6626">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6627">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6627">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6628">La función Func_japanese_my_number_corporate encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6628">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6629">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6629">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6630">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6630">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6631">La función Func_japanese_my_number_corporate encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6631">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6644">Mi número de Japón: personal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6644">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6645">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6645">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6646">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6646">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6647">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6647">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6648">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6648">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6649">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6649">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6650">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6650">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6651">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6651">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6652">Número de 12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6652">12-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6653">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6653">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6654">Número de 12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6654">12-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6655">cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6655">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6656">un espacio, punto o guión opcionales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6656">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6657">cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6657">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6658">un espacio, punto o guión opcionales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6658">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6659">cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6659">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6660">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6660">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6661">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6661">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6662">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6662">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6663">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6663">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6664">La función Func_japanese_my_number_personal encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6664">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6665">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6665">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6666">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6666">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6667">La función Func_japanese_my_number_personal encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6667">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6680">Número de pasaporte de Japón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6680">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6681">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6681">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6682">dos letras seguidas de siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6682">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6683">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6683">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6684">dos letras (sin distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) seguidas de siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6684">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6685">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6686">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6686">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6687">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6688">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6689">La función Func_jp_passport encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6689">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6690">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_jp_passport.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6690">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6700">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6700">パスポート＃</span></span>

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6707">Número de tarjeta de residencia de Japón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6707">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6708">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6708">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6709">12 letras y dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6709">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6710">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6710">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6711">12 letras y dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6711">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6712">dos letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6712">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6713">ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6713">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6714">dos letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6714">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6715">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6716">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6716">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6717">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6718">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6718">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6719">La expresión regular Regex_jp_residence_card_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6719">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6720">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keyword_jp_residence_card_number búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6720">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6729">Número de registro de residente de Japón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6729">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6730">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6730">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6731">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6731">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6732">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6732">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6733">11 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6733">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6734">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6734">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6735">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6735">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6736">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6736">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6737">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6737">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6738">La función Func_jp_resident_registration_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6738">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6739">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6739">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6752">Número de seguro social de Japón (SIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6752">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6753">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6753">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6754">De 7 a 12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6754">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6755">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6755">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6756">7-12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6756">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6757">cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6757">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6758">un guión (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6758">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6759">seis dígitos O</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6759">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6760">De 7 a 12 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6760">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6761">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6762">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6762">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6763">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6764">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6764">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6765">La función Func_jp_sin encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6765">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6766">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_jp_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6766">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6767">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6767">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6768">La función Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6768">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6769">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_jp_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6769">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6790">Número de licencia de conductor de Letonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6790">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6791">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6791">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6792">tres letras seguidas de seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6792">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6793">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6793">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6794">tres letras y seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6794">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6795">tres letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6795">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6796">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6796">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6797">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6797">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6798">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6798">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6799">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6799">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6800">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6800">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6801">La expresión regular  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6801">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6802">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6802">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6926">vadītāja apliecība</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6926">vadītāja apliecība</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6927">Código personal de Letonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6927">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6928">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6928">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6929">11 dígitos y un guión opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6929">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6930">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6930">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6931">Formato antiguo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6931">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6932">11 dígitos y un guión:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6932">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6933">seis dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6933">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6934">un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6934">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6935">un dígito que corresponde al s. de nacimiento ("0" para el s. 19, "1" para el s. XX y "2" para el s. 21)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6935">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6936">cuatro dígitos, generados aleatoriamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6936">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6937">Nuevo formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6937">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6938">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6938">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6939">Dos dígitos "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6939">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6940">Nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6940">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6941">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6941">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6942">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6942">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6943">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6943">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6944">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6944">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6945">La función  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` o regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6945">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6946">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6946">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6947">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6947">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-6948">La función  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` o regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-6948">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7011">Número de pasaporte de Letonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7011">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7012">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7012">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7013">dos letras o dígitos seguidos de siete dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7013">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7014">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7014">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7015">dos letras o dígitos seguidos de siete dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7015">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7016">dos dígitos o letras (no distinguen mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7016">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7017">siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7017">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7018">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7018">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7019">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7019">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7020">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7020">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7021">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7021">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7022">La expresión regular  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7022">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7023">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7023">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7024">La expresión regular encuentra la fecha con el `Regex_eu_passport_date1` formato DD.MM.YYYY o se encuentra una palabra clave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7024">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7025">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7025">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7026">La expresión regular  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7026">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7027">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7027">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7050">Número de licencia de conductor de Lituania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7050">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7051">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7051">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7052">ocho dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7052">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7053">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7053">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7054">ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7054">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7055">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7055">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7056">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7056">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7057">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7057">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7058">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7058">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7059">La expresión regular  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7059">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7060">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7060">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
```

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7193">11 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7193">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7195">11 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7195">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7196">un dígito (1-6) que corresponde al género y al siglo de nacimiento de la persona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7196">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7197">seis dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7197">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7198">tres dígitos que corresponden al número de serie de la fecha de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7198">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7199">un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7199">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7200">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7200">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7201">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7201">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7202">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7202">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7203">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7203">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7204">La función  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7204">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7205">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7205">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7206">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7206">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7207">La función  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7207">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7242">Número de pasaporte de Lituania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7242">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7243">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7243">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7244">ocho dígitos o letras sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7244">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7245">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7245">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7246">ocho dígitos o letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7246">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7247">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7248">no aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7248">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7249">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7250">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7250">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7251">La expresión regular  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7251">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7252">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7252">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7253">La expresión regular `Regex_eu_passport_date3` encuentra la fecha con el formato DD MM YYYY o se encuentra una palabra clave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7253">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7254">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7254">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7255">La expresión regular  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7255">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7256">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7256">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7276">Número de licencia de conductor de Luxemburgo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7276">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7277">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7277">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7278">seis dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7278">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7279">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7279">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7280">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7280">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7281">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7282">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7282">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7283">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7284">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7284">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7285">La expresión regular  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7285">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7286">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7286">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7287">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7287">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7288">Keywords_eu_driver de s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7288">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7289">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7289">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7290">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7290">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7291">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7291">driverlicense</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7419">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7419">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7421">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7421">11 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7424">sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7424">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7425">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7426">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7426">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7427">La función  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7427">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7428">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7428">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7429">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7430">La función  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7430">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7453">Número de pasaporte de Luxemburgo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7453">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7454">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7454">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7455">ocho dígitos o letras sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7455">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7456">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7456">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7457">ocho dígitos o letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7457">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7458">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7458">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7459">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7459">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7460">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7460">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7461">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7461">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7462">La expresión regular  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7462">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7463">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7463">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7464">La expresión regular `Regex_eu_passport_date3` encuentra la fecha con el formato DD MM YYYY o se encuentra una palabra clave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7464">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7465">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7465">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7466">La expresión regular  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7466">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7467">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7467">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7499">Número de identificación nacional de Luxemburgo (personas no naturales)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7499">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7500">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7500">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7501">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7501">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7502">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7502">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7503">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7503">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7504">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7504">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7505">un espacio opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7505">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7506">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7506">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7507">un espacio opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7507">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7508">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7508">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7509">un espacio opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7509">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7510">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7510">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7511">un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7511">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7512">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7513">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7513">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7514">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7515">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7515">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7516">La función  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7516">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7517">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7517">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7518">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7518">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7519">La función  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7519">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7520">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7520">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7521">Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7521">Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7522">carte de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7522">carte de sécurité sociale</span></span>

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7559">Número de tarjeta de identificación de Malasia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7559">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7560">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7560">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7561">12 dígitos que contienen guiones opcionales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7561">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7562">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7562">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7563">12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7563">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7564">seis dígitos en el formato AAMMDD, que son la fecha de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7564">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7565">un guión (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7565">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7566">código de lugar de nacimiento de dos letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7566">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7567">un guión (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7567">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7568">tres dígitos aleatorios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7568">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7569">código de género de un dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7569">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7570">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7570">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7571">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7571">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7572">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7572">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7573">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7573">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7574">La expresión regular Regex_malaysia_id_card_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7574">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7575">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7575">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
