## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7602">Número de licencia de conductor de Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7602">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7603">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7603">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7604">Combinación de dos caracteres y seis dígitos en el patrón especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7604">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7605">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7605">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7606">combinación de dos caracteres y seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7606">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7607">dos caracteres (dígitos o letras, no distinguen mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7607">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7608">un espacio (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7608">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7609">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7609">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7610">un espacio (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7610">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7611">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7611">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7612">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7612">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7613">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7613">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7614">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7614">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7615">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7615">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7616">La expresión regular  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7616">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7617">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7617">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7741">Número de tarjeta de identidad de Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7741">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7742">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7742">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7743">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7743">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7744">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7744">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7745">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7745">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7746">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7746">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7747">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7747">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7748">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7748">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7749">siete dígitos seguidos de una letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7749">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7750">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7750">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7751">siete dígitos seguidos de una letra:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7751">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7752">siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7752">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7753">una letra de "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (no se puede insensible a mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7753">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7754">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7754">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7755">No aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7755">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7756">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7756">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7757">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7757">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7758">La expresión regular  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7758">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7759">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7759">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7760">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7760">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7761">La expresión regular  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7761">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7764">número de servicio del ciudadano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7764">citizen service number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7768">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7768">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7778">Número de pasaporte de Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7778">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7779">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7780">siete dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7780">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7781">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7782">siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7782">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7783">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7783">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7784">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7784">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7785">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7785">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7786">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7786">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7787">La expresión regular  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7787">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7788">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7788">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7789">Se encuentra una palabra `Keywords_eu_passport_date` clave de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7789">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7790">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7790">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7791">La expresión regular  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7791">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7792">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7792">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7812">Número de identificación fiscal de Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7812">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7813">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7813">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7814">Para nacionales maltés:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7814">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7815">siete dígitos y una letra en el patrón especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7815">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7816">Entidades maltesas y nacionales no maltés:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7816">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7817">nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7817">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7818">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7818">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7819">Nacionales maltés: siete dígitos y una letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7819">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7820">siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7820">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7821">una letra (no distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7821">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7822">Entidades maltesas y nacionales no maltés: nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7822">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7823">nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7823">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7824">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7824">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7825">No aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7825">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7826">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7826">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7827">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7827">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7828">La expresión  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  regular o encuentra contenido que coincide con el `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7828">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7829">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7829">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7830">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7830">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7831">La expresión  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` regular o encuentra contenido que coincide con el `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7831">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7864">Número de servicio del ciudadano (BSN) de Países Bajos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7864">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7865">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7866">ocho o nueve dígitos que contienen espacios opcionales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7866">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7867">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7867">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7868">ocho nueve dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7868">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7869">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7869">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7870">un espacio (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7870">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7871">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7871">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7872">un espacio (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7872">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7873">dos o tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7873">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7874">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7874">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7875">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7875">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7876">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7876">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7877">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7877">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7878">La función Func_netherlands_bsn encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7878">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7879">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_netherlands_bsn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7879">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7880">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7880">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7904">Número de licencia de conductor de Países Bajos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7904">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7905">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7905">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7906">diez dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7906">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7907">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7907">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7908">diez dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7908">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7909">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7910">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7910">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7911">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7912">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7912">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7913">La expresión regular  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7913">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-7914">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-7914">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8042">Número de pasaporte de Países Bajos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8042">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8043">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8043">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8044">nueve letras o dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8044">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8045">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8045">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8046">nueve letras o dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8046">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8047">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8047">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8048">no aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8048">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8049">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8049">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8050">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8050">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8051">La expresión regular  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8051">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8052">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8052">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8053">La expresión regular encuentra la fecha con el formato `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (ejemplo: 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8053">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8054">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8055">La expresión regular  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8055">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8056">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8056">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8074">Número de identificación fiscal de Países Bajos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8074">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8075">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8075">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8076">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8076">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8077">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8077">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8078">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8078">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8079">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8079">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8080">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8080">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8081">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8081">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8082">nueve dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8082">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8083">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8083">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8084">nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8084">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8085">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8085">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8086">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8086">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8087">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8087">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8088">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8088">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8089">La función  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8089">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8090">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8090">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8091">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8091">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8092">La función  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8092">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8130">Número de impuestos sobre el valor agregado de Países Bajos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8130">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8131">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8131">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8132">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8132">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8133">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8133">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8134">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8134">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8135">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8135">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8136">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8136">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8137">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8137">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8138">Patrón alfanumérico de 14 caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8138">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8139">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8139">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8140">Patrón alfanumérico de 14 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8140">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8141">N o n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8141">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8142">L o l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8142">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8143">espacio opcional, punto o guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8143">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8144">nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8144">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8145">espacio opcional, punto o guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8145">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8146">B o b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8146">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8147">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8147">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8148">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8148">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8149">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8149">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8150">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8150">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8151">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8151">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8152">La función Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8152">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8153">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8153">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8154">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8154">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8155">La función Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8155">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8164">Número de cuenta bancaria de Nueva Zelanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8164">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8165">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8165">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8166">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8166">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8167">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8167">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8168">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8168">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8169">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8169">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8170">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8170">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8171">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8172">Patrón de 14 a 16 dígitos con delimitador opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8172">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8173">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8174">Patrón de 14 a 16 dígitos con delimitador opcional:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8174">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8175">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8175">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8176">un espacio o un guión opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8176">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8177">de tres a cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8177">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8178">un espacio o un guión opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8178">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8179">siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8179">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8180">un espacio o un guión opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8180">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8181">de dos a tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8181">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8182">un espacio o un guión de opciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8182">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8183">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8183">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8184">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8184">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8185">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8185">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8186">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8186">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8187">La función Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8187">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8188">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8188">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8189">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8189">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8190">La función Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8190">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8207">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8207">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8208">patrón alfanumérico de ocho caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8208">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8209">dos letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8209">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8210">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8210">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8211">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8212">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8213">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8214">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8214">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8215">La función Func_newzealand_driver_license_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8215">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8216">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8216">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8217">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8217">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8218">La función Func_newzealand_driver_license_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8218">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8285">Número de ingresos por el interior de Nueva Zelanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8285">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8286">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8286">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8287">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8287">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8288">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8288">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8289">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8289">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8290">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8290">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8291">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8291">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8292">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8292">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8293">ocho o nueve dígitos con delimitadores opcionales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8293">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8294">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8294">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8295">ocho o nueve dígitos con delimitadores opcionales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8295">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8296">dos o tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8296">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8297">un espacio opcional o un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8297">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8298">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8298">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8299">un espacio opcional o un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8299">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8300">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8300">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8301">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8301">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8302">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8302">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8303">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8303">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8304">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8304">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8305">La función Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8305">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8306">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8306">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8307">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8307">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8308">La función Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8308">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8317">Número de salud del ministerio de Salud de Nueva Zelanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8317">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8318">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8318">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8319">tres letras, un espacio (opcional) y cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8319">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8320">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8320">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8321">tres letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas), excepto "I" y "O"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8321">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8322">un espacio (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8322">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8323">cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8323">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8324">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8324">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8325">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8325">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8326">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8326">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8327">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8327">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8328">La función Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8328">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8329">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_nz_terms.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8329">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8330">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8330">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8331">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8331">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8332">La función Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8332">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8333">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8333">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8347">Número de redes sociales de Nueva Zelanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8347">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8348">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8348">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8349">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8349">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8350">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8350">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8351">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8351">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8352">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8352">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8353">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8353">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8354">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8355">nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8355">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8356">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8356">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8357">nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8357">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8358">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8358">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8359">un guión opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8359">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8360">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8360">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8361">un guión opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8361">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8362">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8362">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8363">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8363">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8364">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8364">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8365">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8365">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8366">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8366">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8367">La función Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8367">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8368">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8368">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8369">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8369">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8370">La función Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8370">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8378">Número de identificación de Noruega</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8378">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8379">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8379">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8380">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8380">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8381">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8381">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8382">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8382">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8383">seis dígitos en el formato DDMMYY que son la fecha de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8383">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8384">número individual de tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8384">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8385">dos dígitos de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8385">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8386">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8386">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8387">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8387">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8388">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8388">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8389">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8389">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8390">La función Func_norway_id_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8390">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8391">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_norway_id_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8391">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8392">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8392">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8393">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8393">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8394">La función Func_norway_id_numbe encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8394">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8395">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8395">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8401">Identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8401">Identification</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8404">Número de identificación multipropósito unificado de Filipinas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8404">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8405">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8405">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8406">12 dígitos separados por guiones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8406">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8407">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8407">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8408">12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8408">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8409">cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8409">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8410">un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8410">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8411">siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8411">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8412">un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8412">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8413">un dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8413">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8414">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8414">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8415">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8415">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8416">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8416">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8417">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8417">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8418">La expresión regular Regex_philippines_unified_id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8418">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8419">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_philippines_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8419">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8426">Número de licencia de conductor de Polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8426">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8427">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8427">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8428">14 dígitos que contienen 2 barras diagonales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8428">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8429">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8429">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8430">14 dígitos y 2 barras diagonales:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8430">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8431">cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8431">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8432">una barra diagonal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8432">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8433">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8433">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8434">una barra diagonal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8434">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8435">siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8435">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8436">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8436">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8437">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8437">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8438">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8438">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8439">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8439">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8440">La expresión regular  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8440">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8441">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8441">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8565">Tarjeta de identidad de Polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8565">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8566">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8566">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8567">tres letras y seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8567">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8568">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8568">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8569">tres letras (sin distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) seguidas de seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8569">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8570">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8570">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8571">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8571">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8572">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8572">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8573">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8573">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8574">La función Func_polish_national_id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8574">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8575">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8575">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8576">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8576">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8577">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8577">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8581">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8581">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8582">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8582">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8583">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8583">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8584">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8584">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
