## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8587">Identificación nacional de Polonia (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8587">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8588">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8588">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8589">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8589">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8590">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8590">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8591">seis dígitos que representan la fecha de nacimiento en el formato AAMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8591">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8592">cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8592">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8593">un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8593">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8594">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8594">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8595">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8595">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8596">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8596">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8597">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8597">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8598">La función Func_pesel_identification_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8598">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8599">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_pesel_identification_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8599">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8600">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8600">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8601">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8601">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8602">La función Func_pesel_identification_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8602">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8603">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8603">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8615">Número de pasaporte de Polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8615">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8616">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial número de pasaporte de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8616">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8617">Está disponible como una entidad independiente de tipo de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8617">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8618">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8618">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8619">dos letras y siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8619">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8620">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8620">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8621">Dos letras (sin distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) seguidas de siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8621">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8622">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8622">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8623">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8623">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8624">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8624">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8625">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8625">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8626">La función Func_polish_passport_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8626">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8627">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8627">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8628">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8628">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8629">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8629">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8630">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8630">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8635">Número REGON de Polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8635">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8636">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8636">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8637">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8637">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8638">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8638">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8639">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8639">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8640">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8640">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8641">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8641">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8642">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8642">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8643">Número de 9 o 14 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8643">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8644">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8644">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8645">número de nueve o 14 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8645">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8646">nueve dígitos o</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8646">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8647">nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8647">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8648">guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8648">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8649">cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8649">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8650">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8650">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8651">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8651">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8652">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8652">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8653">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8653">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8654">La función Func_polish_regon_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8654">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8655">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keywords_polish_regon_number búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8655">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8656">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8656">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8657">La función Func_polish_regon_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8657">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8658">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8658">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8674">Número de identificación fiscal de Polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8674">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8675">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8675">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8676">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8676">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8677">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8677">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8678">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8678">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8679">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8679">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8680">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8680">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8681">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8681">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8682">11 dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8682">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8683">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8683">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8684">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8684">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8685">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8686">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8686">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8687">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8688">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8688">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8689">La función  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8689">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8690">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8690">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8720">Número de tarjeta de ciudadano de Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8720">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8721">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8721">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8722">ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8722">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8723">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8723">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8724">ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8724">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8725">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8726">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8726">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8727">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8728">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8728">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8729">La expresión regular Regex_portugal_citizen_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8729">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8730">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_portugal_citizen_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8730">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8750">Número de licencia de conductor de Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8750">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8751">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8752">dos patrones: dos letras seguidas de 5 a 8 dígitos con caracteres especiales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8752">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8753">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8754">Patrón 1: dos letras seguidas de 5/6 con caracteres especiales:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8754">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8755">Dos letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8755">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8756">Un guión </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8756">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8757">Cinco o seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8757">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8758">Un espacio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8758">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8759">Un dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8759">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8760">Patrón 2: una letra seguida de 6/8 dígitos con caracteres especiales:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8760">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8761">Una letra (no distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8761">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8762">Un guión </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8762">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8763">Seis u ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8763">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8764">Un espacio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8764">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8765">Un dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8765">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8766">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8767">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8767">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8768">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8769">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8769">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8770">La expresión regular  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8770">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8771">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8771">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8905">una letra seguida de seis dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8905">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8906">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8906">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8907">una letra seguida de seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8907">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8908">una letra (no distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8908">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8909">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8909">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8910">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8910">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8911">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8911">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8912">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8912">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8913">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8913">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8914">La expresión regular  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8914">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8915">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8915">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8916">La expresión regular encuentra la fecha con el `Regex_eu_passport_date1` formato DD.MM.YYYY o se encuentra una palabra clave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8916">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8917">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8917">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8918">La expresión regular  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8918">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8919">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8919">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8946">Número de identificación fiscal de Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8946">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8947">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8947">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8948">nueve dígitos con espacios opcionales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8948">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8949">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8949">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8950">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8950">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8951">un espacio opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8951">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8952">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8952">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8953">un espacio opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8953">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8954">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8954">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8955">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8955">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8956">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8956">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8957">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8957">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8958">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8958">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8959">La función  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8959">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8960">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8960">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8961">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8961">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8962">La función  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8962">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8987">Número de licencia de conductor de Rumania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8987">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8988">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8988">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8989">un carácter seguido de ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8989">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8990">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8990">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8991">un carácter seguido de ocho dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8991">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8992">una letra (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) o dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8992">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8993">ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8993">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8994">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8994">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8995">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8995">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8996">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8996">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8997">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8997">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8998">La expresión regular  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8998">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-8999">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-8999">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9000">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9000">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9002">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9002">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9003">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9003">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9004">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9004">driverlicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9005">driverlicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9005">driverlicenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9006">driverlicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9006">driverlicence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9007">driverlicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9007">driverlicences</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9134">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9134">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9135">13 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9135">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9136">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9136">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9137">un dígito del 1 al 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9137">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9138">seis dígitos que representan la fecha de nacimiento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9138">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9139">dos dígitos, que pueden ser 01-52 o 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9139">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9140">cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9140">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9141">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9141">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9142">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9142">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9143">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9143">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9144">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9144">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9145">La función  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9145">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9146">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9146">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9147">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9147">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9148">La función  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9148">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9199">Número de pasaporte de Rumania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9199">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9200">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9200">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9201">ocho o nueve dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9201">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9202">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9203">ocho o nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9203">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9204">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9204">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9205">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9205">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9206">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9206">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9207">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9207">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9208">La expresión regular  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9208">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9209">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9209">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9210">La expresión regular encuentra la fecha en el formato `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (ejemplo: 01 FEB/FEB 10) o se encuentra una palabra clave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9210">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9211">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9211">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9212">La expresión regular  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9212">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9213">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9213">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9231">Número de pasaporte de Rusia nacionales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9231">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9232">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9232">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9233">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9233">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9234">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9234">communication compliance policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9236">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9236">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9237">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9237">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9238">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9238">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9239">Número de 10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9239">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9240">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9240">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9241">Número de 10 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9241">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9242">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9242">two digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9244">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9244">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9245">un espacio opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9245">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9246">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9246">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9247">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9248">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9248">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9249">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9250">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9250">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9251">El elemento regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9251">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9252">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9252">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9269">Número de pasaporte internacional de Rusia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9269">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9270">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9270">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9271">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9271">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9272">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9272">communication compliance policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9274">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9274">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9275">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9275">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9276">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9276">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9278">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9278">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9279">número de nueve dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9279">nine-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9280">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9280">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9281">un espacio opcional o un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9281">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9282">siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9282">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9283">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9283">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9284">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9284">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9285">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9285">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9286">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9286">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9287">El elemento regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9287">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9288">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9288">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9305">Identificación nacional de Arabia Saudí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9305">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9306">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9306">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9307">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9307">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9308">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9308">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9309">10 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9309">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9310">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9310">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9311">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9311">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9312">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9312">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9313">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9313">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9314">La expresión regular Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9314">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9315">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9315">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9322">Número de tarjeta de identidad de registro nacional (NRIC) de Singapur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9322">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9323">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9323">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9324">nueve letras y dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9324">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9325">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9325">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9326">nueve letras y dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9326">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9327">la letra "F", "G", "S" o "T" (no distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9327">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9328">siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9328">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9329">un dígito de comprobación alfabético</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9329">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9330">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9330">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9331">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9331">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9332">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9332">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9333">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9333">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9334">La expresión regular Regex_singapore_nric encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9334">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9335">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_singapore_nric.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9335">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9336">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9336">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9337">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9337">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9338">La expresión regular Regex_singapore_nric encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9338">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9339">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9339">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9351">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9351">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9353">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9353">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9354">un carácter seguido de siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9354">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9355">una letra (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) o dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9355">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9356">siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9356">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9357">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9357">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9358">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9358">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9359">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9359">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9360">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9360">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9361">La expresión regular  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9361">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9362">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9362">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9488">Número personal de Eslovaquia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9488">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9489">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9489">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9490">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9490">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9491">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9491">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9492">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9492">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9493">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9493">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9494">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9494">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9495">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9495">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9496">nueve o diez dígitos que contienen barras diagonales inversas opcionales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9496">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9497">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9497">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9498">seis dígitos que representan la fecha de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9498">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9499">barra diagonal opcional (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9499">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9500">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9500">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9501">un dígito de comprobación opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9501">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9502">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9503">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9503">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9504">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9505">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9505">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9506">La función  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9506">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9507">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9507">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9508">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9508">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9509">La función  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9509">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9556">Número de pasaporte de Eslovaquia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9556">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9557">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9558">un dígito o letra seguido de siete dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9558">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9559">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9560">un dígito o letra (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) seguido de siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9560">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9561">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9562">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9562">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9563">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9564">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9564">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9565">La expresión regular  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9565">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9566">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9567">La expresión regular encuentra la fecha con el `Regex_eu_passport_date1` formato DD.MM.YYYY o se encuentra una palabra clave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9567">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9568">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9568">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9569">La expresión regular  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9569">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9570">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9570">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9583">Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9583">Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9584">číslo pasu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9584">číslo pasu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9585">čísla pasov</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9585">čísla pasov</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9586">pas č.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9586">pas č.</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9592">Número de licencia de conductor de Eslovenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9592">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9593">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9593">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9594">nueve dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9594">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9595">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9595">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9596">nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9596">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9597">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9597">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9598">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9598">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9599">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9599">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9600">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9600">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9601">La expresión regular  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9601">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9602">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9602">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
