## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9729">Número de ciudadano maestro único de Eslovenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9729">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9730">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9730">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9731">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9731">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9732">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9732">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9733">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9733">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9734">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9734">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9735">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9735">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9736">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9736">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9737">13 dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9737">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9738">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9738">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9739">13 dígitos en el patrón especificado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9739">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9740">siete dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (DDMMLLL) donde "LLL" corresponde a los tres últimos dígitos del año de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9740">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9741">dos dígitos que corresponden al área de nacimiento "50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9741">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9742">tres dígitos que corresponden a una combinación de sexo y número de serie para las personas que nazcan el mismo día (000-499 para los hombres y 500-999 para las mujeres)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9742">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9743">un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9743">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9744">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9744">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9745">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9745">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9746">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9746">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9747">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9747">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9748">La función  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9748">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9749">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9749">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9750">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9750">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9751">La función  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9751">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9779">Número de pasaporte de Eslovenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9779">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9780">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9781">dos letras seguidas de siete dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9781">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9782">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9783">dos letras seguidas de siete dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9783">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9784">la letra "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9784">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9785">una letra mayúscula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9785">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9786">siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9786">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9787">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9788">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9788">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9789">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9790">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9790">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9791">La expresión regular  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9791">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9792">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9792">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9793">La expresión regular encuentra la fecha con el `Regex_eu_passport_date1` formato DD.MM.YYYY o se encuentra una palabra clave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9793">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9794">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9794">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9795">La expresión regular  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9795">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9796">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9796">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9819">Número de identificación fiscal de Eslovenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9819">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9820">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9820">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9821">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9821">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9822">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9822">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9823">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9823">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9824">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9824">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9825">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9825">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9826">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9826">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9827">ocho dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9827">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9828">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9828">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9829">un dígito del 1 al 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9829">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9830">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9830">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9831">un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9831">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9832">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9832">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9833">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9833">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9834">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9834">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9835">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9835">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9836">La función  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9836">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9837">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9837">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9838">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9838">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9839">La función  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9839">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9863">Número de identificación de Sudáfrica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9863">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9864">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9864">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9865">13 dígitos que pueden contener espacios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9865">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9866">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9866">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9867">13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9867">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9868">seis dígitos en el formato AAMMDD, que son la fecha de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9868">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9869">cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9869">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9870">un indicador de nacionalidad de un solo dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9870">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9871">el dígito "8" o "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9871">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9872">un dígito, que es un dígito de suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9872">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9873">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9874">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9874">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9875">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9876">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9876">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9877">La función Func_south_africa_identification_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9877">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9878">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_south_africa_identification_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9878">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9879">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9879">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9885">Número de registro de residente de Corea del Sur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9885">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9886">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9886">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9887">13 dígitos que contienen un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9887">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9888">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9888">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9889">13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9889">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9890">seis dígitos en el formato AAMMDD, que son la fecha de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9890">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9891">un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9891">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9892">un dígito determinado por el siglo y el género</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9892">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9893">código de región de nacimiento de cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9893">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9894">un dígito usado para diferenciar a las personas para las que los números anteriores son idénticos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9894">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9895">un dígito de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9895">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9896">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9896">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9897">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9897">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9898">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9898">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9899">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9899">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9900">La función Func_south_korea_resident_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9900">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9901">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_south_korea_resident_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9901">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9902">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9902">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9903">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9903">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9904">La función Func_south_korea_resident_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9904">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9905">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9905">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9913">Número de licencia de conductor de España</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9913">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9914">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9915">ocho dígitos seguidos de un carácter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9915">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9916">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9916">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9917">ocho dígitos seguidos de un carácter:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9917">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9918">ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9918">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9919">un dígito o letra (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9919">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9920">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9920">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9921">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9921">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9922">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9922">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9923">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9923">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9924">La función  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o encuentra contenido que coincide con el `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9924">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9925">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9925">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9926">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9926">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-9927">La función  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o encuentra contenido que coincide con el `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-9927">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10061">DNI de España</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10061">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10062">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10062">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10063">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10063">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10064">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10064">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10065">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10065">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10066">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10066">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10067">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10067">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10068">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10068">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10069">ocho dígitos seguidos de un carácter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10069">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10070">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10070">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10071">siete dígitos seguidos de un carácter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10071">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10072">ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10072">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10073">Un espacio o un guión opcionales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10073">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10074">una letra de verificación (no distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10074">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10075">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10075">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10076">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10076">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10077">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10077">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10078">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10078">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10079">La función  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o encuentra contenido que coincide con el `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10079">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10080">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10080">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10081">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10081">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10082">La función  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o encuentra contenido que coincide con el `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10082">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10106">Número de pasaporte de España</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10106">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10107">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10108">una combinación de ocho o nueve caracteres de letras y números sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10108">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10109">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10110">una combinación de ocho o nueve caracteres de letras y números:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10110">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10111">dos dígitos o letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10111">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10112">un dígito o una letra (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10112">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10113">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10113">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10114">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10114">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10115">No aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10115">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10116">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10116">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10117">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10117">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10118">La expresión regular  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10118">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10119">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10119">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10120">La expresión regular encuentra la fecha con el formato `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` DD-MM-YYYY o se encuentra una palabra clave de `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10120">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10121">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10121">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10122">La expresión regular  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10122">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10123">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10123">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10152">Número de la seguridad social de España (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10152">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10153">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial Número de la Seguridad Social de la UE o Identificador equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10153">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10154">Está disponible como una entidad independiente de tipo de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10154">It's  available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10155">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10155">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10156">11 o 12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10156">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10157">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10157">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10158">De 11 a 12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10158">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10159">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10159">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10160">una barra diagonal (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10160">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10161">de siete a ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10161">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10162">una barra diagonal (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10162">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10163">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10163">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10164">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10164">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10165">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10165">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10166">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10166">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10167">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10167">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10168">La función Func_spanish_social_security_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10168">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10169">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10170">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10170">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10171">Ninguno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10171">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10172">Número de identificación fiscal de España</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10172">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10173">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10173">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10174">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10174">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10175">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10175">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10176">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10176">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10177">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10177">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10178">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10178">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10179">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10179">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10180">siete u ocho dígitos y una o dos letras en el patrón especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10180">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10181">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10181">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10182">Personas físicas de España con una tarjeta de identidad nacional de España:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10182">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10183">ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10183">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10184">una letra mayúscula (distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10184">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10185">Españoles no residentes sin un documento de identidad nacional de España</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10185">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10186">una letra mayúscula "L" (distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10186">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10187">siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10187">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10188">una letra mayúscula (distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10188">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10189">Españoles residentes menores de 14 años sin una tarjeta de identidad nacional de España:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10189">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10190">una letra mayúscula "K" (distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10190">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10191">siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10191">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10192">una letra mayúscula (distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10192">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10193">Con el número de identificación de un ciudadano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10193">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10194">una letra mayúscula que es "X", "Y" o "Z" (distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10194">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10195">siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10195">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10196">una letra mayúscula (distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10196">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10197">Personas que no tienen el número de identificación de un ciudadano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10197">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10198">una letra mayúscula que es "M" (distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10198">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10199">siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10199">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10200">una letra mayúscula (distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10200">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10201">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10202">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10202">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10203">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10204">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10204">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10205">La función  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` o encuentra contenido que coincide con el `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10205">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10206">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10206">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10207">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10207">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10208">La función  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` o encuentra contenido que coincide con el `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10208">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10239">SQL Server de conexión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10239">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10240">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10240">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10241">La cadena "User Id", "User ID", "uid" o "UserId" seguida de los caracteres y cadenas descritos en el siguiente patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10241">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10242">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10242">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10243">la cadena "User Id", "User ID", "uid" o "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10243">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10244">cualquier combinación de entre 1 y 200 letras minúsculas o mayúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiales o espacios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10244">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10245">la cadena "Password" o "pwd" donde "pwd" no está precedida por una letra minúscula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10245">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10246">un signo igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10246">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10247">cualquier carácter que no sea un signo de dólar ($), símbolo de porcentaje (%), mayor que símbolo (>), símbolo (@), comillas ("), punto y coma (;), llave izquierda([) o corchete izquierdo ({)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10247">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10248">cualquier combinación de 7 a 128 caracteres que no sean un punto y coma (;), barra diagonal (/) o comillas (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10248">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10249">punto y coma (;) o comillas (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10249">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10250">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10250">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10251">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10251">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10252">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10252">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10253">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10253">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10254">La expresión regular CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10254">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10255">No se encuentra CEP_GlobalFilter palabra clave de la página.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10255">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10256">La expresión regular CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder no encuentra contenido que coincida con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10256">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10257">La expresión regular CEP_CommonExampleKeywords no encuentra contenido que coincida con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10257">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10258">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10258">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10259">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10259">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10260">alguna contraseña</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10260">some-password</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10265">(Tenga en cuenta que técnicamente, este tipo de información confidencial identifica estas palabras clave mediante una expresión regular, no una lista de palabras clave).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10265">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10266">Contraseña o pwd seguido de 0-2 espacios, un signo igual (=), 0-2 espacios y un asterisco (\*) -OR-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10266">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10267">Contraseña o pwd seguido de:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10267">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10268">Signo igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10268">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10269">Símbolo menor que (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10269">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10270">Cualquier combinación de 1-200 caracteres con letras mayúsculas o minúsculas, dígitos, asterisco (\*), guión (-), subrayado (_) o carácter de espacio en blanco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10270">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10271">Símbolo mayor que (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10271">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10285">Número de licencia de conductor de Suecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10285">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10286">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10286">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10287">diez dígitos que contienen un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10287">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10288">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10288">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10289">diez dígitos que contienen un guión:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10289">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10290">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10290">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10291">un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10291">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10292">cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10292">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10293">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10293">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10294">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10294">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10295">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10295">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10296">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10296">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10297">La expresión regular  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10297">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10298">Se encuentra una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` palabra clave o una palabra `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` clave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10298">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10431">Identificación nacional de Suecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10431">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10432">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10432">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10433">10 o 12 dígitos y un delimitador opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10433">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10434">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10434">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10435">10 o 12 dígitos y un delimitador opcional:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10435">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10436">dos dígitos (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10436">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10437">Seis dígitos en fecha de formato AAMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10437">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10438">delimitador de "-" o "+" (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10438">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10439">cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10439">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10440">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10440">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10441">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10441">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10442">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10442">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10443">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10443">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10444">La función `Func_swedish_national_identifier` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10444">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10445">Se encuentra una palabra `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` clave de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10445">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10446">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10446">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10447">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10447">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10448">La función `Func_swedish_national_identifier` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10448">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10449">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10449">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10468">Número de pasaporte de Suecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10468">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10469">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial Número de pasaporte de la UE y está disponible como una entidad independiente de tipo de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10469">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10470">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10470">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10471">ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10471">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10472">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10472">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10473">ocho dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10473">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10474">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10474">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10475">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10475">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10476">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10476">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10477">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10477">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10478">la expresión regular Regex_sweden_passport_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10478">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10479">se cumple una de las siguientes condiciones:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10479">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10480">se encuentra una palabra clave Keyword_passport búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10480">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10481">se encuentra una palabra clave Keyword_sweden_passport búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10481">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10482">Palabras clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10482">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_sweden_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10483">Keyword_sweden_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10483">Keyword_sweden_passport</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10512">Número de la seguridad social de Suecia o identificación equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10512">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10513">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial Número de la Seguridad Social de la UE o Identificador equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10513">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10514">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10514">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10515">12 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10515">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10516">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10516">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10517">12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10517">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10518">ocho dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (AAAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10518">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10519">tres dígitos que corresponden a un número de serie donde:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10519">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10520">el último dígito del número de serie indica el sexo por la asignación de un número impar para el varón y un número par para la mujer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10520">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10521">Antes de 1990, la asignación de un número de serie correspondía al país en el que se encontraba el portador del número.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10521">Before 1990, the assignment of a serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10522">O bien( si hubo antes de 1947) donde había estado vivo, según los registros fiscales, el 1 de enero de 1947, con un código especial (normalmente 9 como el séptimo dígito) para los investigadores.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10522">Or (if born before 1947) where they had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the seventh digit) for immigrants.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10523">un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10523">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10524">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10524">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10525">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10525">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10526">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10526">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10527">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10527">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10528">La función  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10528">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10529">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10529">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10530">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10530">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10531">La función  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10531">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```
