## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10547">Número de identificación fiscal de Suecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10547">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10548">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10548">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10549">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10549">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10550">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10550">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10551">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10551">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10552">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10552">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10553">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10553">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10554">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10555">10 dígitos y un símbolo en el patrón especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10555">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10556">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10557">10 dígitos y un símbolo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10557">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10558">seis dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10558">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10559">un signo más o menos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10559">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10560">tres dígitos que hacen que el número de identificación sea único, donde:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10560">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10561">para números emitidos antes de 1990, el séptimo y octavo dígito identifican el país de nacimiento o las personas que han nado en el exterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10561">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10562">el dígito en la noveno posición indica el género por impar para el varón o incluso para la mujer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10562">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10563">un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10563">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10564">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10564">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10565">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10565">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10566">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10566">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10567">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10567">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10568">La función  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10568">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10569">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10569">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10570">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10570">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10571">La función  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10571">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10597">Código SWIFT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10597">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10598">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10598">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10599">cuatro letras seguidas de 5 a 31 letras o dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10599">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10600">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10600">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10601">cuatro letras seguidas de 5 a 31 letras o dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10601">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10602">código bancario de cuatro letras (no distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10602">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10603">un espacio opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10603">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10604">4-28 letras o dígitos (el número básico de cuenta bancaria (BBAN))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10604">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10605">un espacio opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10605">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10606">de uno a tres letras o dígitos (resto del BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10606">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10607">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10608">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10608">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10609">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10610">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10610">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10611">La expresión regular Regex_swift encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10611">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10612">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_swift.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10612">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10649">Número SSN AHV de Suiza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10649">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10650">Este tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible para su uso en:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10650">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10651">directivas de prevención de pérdida de datos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10651">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10652">directivas de cumplimiento de comunicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10652">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10653">gobierno de la información</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10653">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10654">administración de registros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10654">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10655">Seguridad de aplicaciones en la nube de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10655">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10656">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10656">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10657">Número de 13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10657">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10658">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10658">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10659">Número de 13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10659">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10660">tres dígitos - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10660">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10661">un punto opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10661">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10662">cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10662">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10663">un punto opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10663">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10664">cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10664">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10665">un punto opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10665">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10666">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10666">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10667">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10668">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10668">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10669">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10670">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10670">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10671">La función Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10671">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10672">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10672">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10673">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10673">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10674">La función Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10674">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10695">Número de identificación nacional de Taiwán</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10695">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10696">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10696">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10697">una letra (en inglés) seguida de nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10697">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10698">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10698">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10699">una letra (en inglés) seguida de nueve dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10699">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10700">una letra (en inglés, no distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10700">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10701">el dígito "1" o "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10701">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10702">ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10702">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10703">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10704">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10704">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10705">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10706">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10707">La función Func_taiwanese_national_id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10707">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10708">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_taiwanese_national_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10708">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10709">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10709">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10710">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10710">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10711">La función Func_taiwanese_national_id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10711">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10712">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10712">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10729">Número de pasaporte de Taiwán</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10729">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10730">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10730">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10731">número de pasaporte biométrico: nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10731">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10732">número de pasaporte no biométrico: nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10732">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10733">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10733">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10734">número de pasaporte biométrico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10734">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10735">el carácter "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10735">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10736">ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10736">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10737">número de pasaporte no biométrico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10737">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10738">nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10738">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10739">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10739">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10740">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10740">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10741">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10741">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10742">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10742">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10743">La expresión regular Regex_taiwan_passport encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10743">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10744">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_taiwan_passport.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10744">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10755">Número de certificado de residente de Taiwán (ARC/TARC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10755">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10756">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10757">10 letras y dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10757">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10758">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10759">10 letras y dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10759">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10760">dos letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10760">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10761">ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10761">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10762">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10762">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10763">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10763">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10764">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10764">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10765">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10765">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10766">La expresión regular Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10766">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10767">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10767">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10781">Código de identificación de la población tailandesa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10781">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10782">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10782">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10783">13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10783">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10784">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10784">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10785">13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10785">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10786">el primer dígito no es cero o nueve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10786">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10787">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10787">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10788">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10789">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10789">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10790">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10791">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10791">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10792">La función Func_Thai_Citizen_Id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10792">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10793">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10793">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10794">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10794">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10795">La función Func_Thai_Citizen_Id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10795">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10797">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10797">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10807">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10807">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10808">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10808">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10809">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10809">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10810">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10810">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10811">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10811">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10812">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10812">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10813">La función Func_Turkish_National_Id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10813">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10814">Se encuentra una palabra clave Keyword_Turkish_National_Id búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10814">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10815">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10815">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10816">La función Func_Turkish_National_Id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10816">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10823">Reino Unido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10823">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10824">número de licencia de conductor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10824">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10825">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial Número de licencia de conductor de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10825">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10826">Está disponible como una entidad independiente de tipo de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10826">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10827">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10827">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10828">Combinación de 18 letras y dígitos en el formato especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10828">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10829">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10829">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10830">18 letras y dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10830">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10831">Cinco letras (no distinguen mayúsculas de minúsculas) o el dígito "9" en lugar de una letra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10831">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10832">Un dígito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10832">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10833">Cinco dígitos en el formato de fecha MMDDY para la fecha de nacimiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10833">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10834">El séptimo carácter se incrementa en 50 si el controlador es mujer; para examen, de 51 a 62 en lugar de 01 a 12.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10834">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10835">Dos letras (no distinguen mayúsculas de minúsculas) o el dígito "9" en lugar de una letra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10835">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10836">Cinco dígitos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10836">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10837">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10837">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10838">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10838">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10839">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10839">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10840">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10840">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10841">La función Func_uk_drivers_license encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10841">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10842">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_uk_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10842">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10843">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10843">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10861">Reino Unido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10861">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10862">número de lista de elecciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10862">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10863">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10863">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10864">dos letras seguidas de 1-4 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10864">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10865">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10865">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10866">dos letras (sin distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) seguidas de 1 a 4 números</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10866">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10867">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10867">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10868">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10868">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10869">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10869">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10870">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10870">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10871">La expresión regular Regex_uk_electoral encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10871">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10872">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_uk_electoral.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10872">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10879">Reino Unido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10879">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10880">número de servicio de salud nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10880">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10881">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10881">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10882">De 10 a 17 dígitos separados por espacios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10882">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10883">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10883">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10884">10-17 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10884">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10885">3 o 10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10885">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10886">un espacio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10886">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10887">tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10887">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10888">un espacio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10888">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10889">cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10889">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10890">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10890">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10891">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10891">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10892">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10892">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10893">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10893">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10894">La función Func_uk_nhs_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10894">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10895">Una de las siguientes opciones es verdadera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10895">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10896">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_uk_nhs_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10896">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10897">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_uk_nhs_number1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10897">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10898">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10898">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10899">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10899">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10917">Reino Unido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10917">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10918">número de seguro nacional (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10918">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10919">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial Número de identificación nacional de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10919">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10920">Está disponible como una entidad independiente de tipo de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10920">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10921">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10922">siete caracteres o nueve caracteres separados por espacios o guiones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10922">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10923">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10924">dos patrones posibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10924">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10925">dos letras (los NINO válidos usan solo ciertos caracteres en este prefijo, que este patrón valida, no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10925">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10926">seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10926">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10927">ya sea 'A', 'B', 'C' o 'D' (como el prefijo, solo se permiten ciertos caracteres en el sufijo, no distinguen mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10927">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10928">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10928">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10929">dos letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10929">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10930">un espacio o guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10930">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10931">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10931">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10932">un espacio o guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10932">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10933">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10933">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10934">un espacio o guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10934">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10935">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10935">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10936">un espacio o guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10936">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10937">'A', 'B', 'C' o 'D'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10937">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10938">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10938">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10939">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10939">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10940">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10940">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10941">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10941">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10942">La función Func_uk_nino encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10942">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10943">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_uk_nino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10943">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10944">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10944">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10945">La función Func_uk_nino encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10945">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10975">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10975">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10977">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10977">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10978">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10978">10 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10982">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10982">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10983">La función  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10983">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-10984">Se encuentra una palabra  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-10984">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">

      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11004">Número de cuenta bancaria de EE. UU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11004">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11005">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11005">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11006">De 6 a 17 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11006">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11007">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11007">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11008">De 6 a 17 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11008">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11009">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11009">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11010">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11010">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11011">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11011">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11012">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11012">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11013">La expresión regular Regex_usa_bank_account_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11013">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11014">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_usa_Bank_Account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11014">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11044">Número de licencia de conductor de EE. UU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11044">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11045">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11045">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11046">Depende del estado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11046">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11047">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11047">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11048">depende del estado, por ejemplo, Nueva York:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11048">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11049">nueve dígitos con formato como ddd ddd ddd coincidirán.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11049">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11050">nueve dígitos como ddddddddd no coincidirán.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11050">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11051">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11051">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11052">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11052">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11053">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11053">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11054">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11055">La función Func_new_york_drivers_license_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11055">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11056">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11056">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11057">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_us_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11057">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11058">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11058">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11059">La función Func_new_york_drivers_license_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11059">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11060">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11060">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11061">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11061">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11062">No se encuentra ninguna palabra clave de Keyword_us_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11062">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11150">Driver's Lics#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11150">Driver's Lics#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11151">Driver's License#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11151">Driver's License#</span></span>

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11160">Número de identificación de contribuyente individual (ITIN) de EE. UU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11160">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11161">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11161">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11162">nueve dígitos que empiezan por "9" y contienen un "7" o "8" como cuarto dígito, con formato opcional con espacios o guiones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11162">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11163">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11163">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11164">con formato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11164">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11165">el dígito "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11165">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11166">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11166">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11167">un espacio o guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11167">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11168">un "7" o "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11168">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11169">un dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11169">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11170">un espacio o guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11170">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11171">cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11171">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11172">sin formato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11172">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11173">el dígito "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11173">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11174">dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11174">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11175">un "7" o "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11175">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11176">cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11176">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11177">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11177">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11178">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11178">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11179">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11179">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11180">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11180">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11181">La función Func_formatted_itin encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11181">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11182">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_itin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11182">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11183">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11183">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11184">La función Func_unformatted_itin encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11184">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11185">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_itin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11185">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11186">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11186">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11187">La función Func_formatted_itin o Func_unformatted_itin encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11187">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11189">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11189">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11195">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11195">ssn</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11202">Número de seguridad social (SSN) de EE. UU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11202">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11203">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11204">nueve dígitos, que pueden estar en un patrón con formato o sin formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11204">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11205">Si se ha emitido antes de mediados de 2011, el SSN tiene un formato seguro en aquellas partes del número que deben incluirse dentro de ciertos rangos para que sean válidas (pero no hay ninguna suma de comprobación).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11205">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11206">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11206">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11207">Cuatro funciones buscan SSN en cuatro patrones diferentes:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11207">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11208">Func_ssn busca SSN con formato seguro anteriores a 2011 y formateados con guiones o espacios (ddd-dd-dddd O ddd dd dddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11208">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11209">Func_unformatted_ssn busca SSN con formato seguro anteriores a 2011 y formateados de manera no específica como nueve dígitos consecutivos (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11209">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11210">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn busca SSN posteriores a 2011 y formateados con guiones o espacios (ddd-dd-dddd O ddd dd dddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11210">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11211">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn busca SSN posteriores a 2011 y formateados de manera no específica como nueve dígitos consecutivos (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11211">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11212">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11212">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11213">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11213">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11214">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11214">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11215">Una directiva DLP tiene la confianza alta de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11215">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11216">La función Func_ssn encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11216">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11217">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11217">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11218">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza media de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11218">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11219">La función Func_unformatted_ssn busca contenido que coincida con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11219">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11220">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11220">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11221">Una directiva DLP tiene confianza baja en que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11221">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11222">La función Func_randomized_formatted_ssn encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11222">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11223">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11223">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11224">Una directiva DLP está segura al 55% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11224">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11225">La función Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11225">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11226">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11226">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11241">EE.UU. / Reino Unido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11241">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11242">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11242">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11243">Reino Unido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11243">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11244">La entidad de tipo de información confidencial de número de pasaporte está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial número de pasaporte de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11244">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11245">Está disponible como una entidad independiente de tipo de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11245">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11246">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11246">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11247">nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11247">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11248">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11248">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11249">nueve dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11249">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="6dda1-11250">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6dda1-11250">Checksum</span></span>
